title: FRENCH SPEAKING APPLICATION CONSULTANT TO PAGERO
description:
Bonjour! Comment vas-tu? Do you have an interest in IT and want to work for an industry leader? Pagero is currently looking for an Application Consultant fluent in German to join their team in Gothenburg. Submit your application now!
  
  

**ABOUT THE POSITION:**  

As an Application Consultant at Pagero, you will have a diverse and developmental role. Here, you'll have the opportunity to take responsibility and play a central role in technical matters with both clients and colleagues. Primarily, you will provide assistance, support, and development during the implementation phase of Pagero's products for clients.
  
  

Some of your responsibilities as an Application Consultant include:
  
  

Develop and improve internal processes to find more efficient work methods and techniques.
  
Familiarize yourself with clients' internal processes to understand and create value for the customer.
  
Develop and implement best practices for Pagero applications.
  
  

To succeed in this role, you need a strong technical interest and enjoy working in a team. Sharing knowledge with colleagues and humbly learning from others is important in this role. You should be able to take responsibility for your tasks and independently drive them to completion.
  
  

Your employment will start with a comprehensive introduction during the first week, where you'll meet different departments and get an overview of Pagero's work. This will be followed by continued training and development within the group, learning from more experienced colleagues.
  
  

**THE IDEAL CANDIDATE:**  

Has an university education in a relevant field, such as informatics, systems science or data economics.
  
Speaks and writes fluently in both French and English.
  
Has a technical interest and good communication skills.
  
  

**It is considered advantageous if you:**  

Have previous experience in a similar role.
  
  

Personal suitability will be heavily weighted for this role. To succeed and thrive in this position, you are a driven individual with a positive mindset. Additionally, we believe that you are social and have a strong technical interest! You see this as a fantastic opportunity to start your career at an international and innovative company with excellent opportunities for continued growth and advancement within the company.
  
  

**ABOUT THE COMPANY:**  

We believe business should be easy. That is why we are building the world’s largest, open business network. With our cloud-based network, you can reach any business, anywhere in the world – no matter how many borders your operations may cross. We take care of the technical and regulatory requirements across your entire order-to-cash, purchase-to-pay and freight processes, to give you data accuracy and security, transparency and real-time visibility. All this through a single connection. Find out more at www.pagero.com.
  
  

**ABOUT THE EMPLOYMENT:**  

This is a direct recruitment, meaning the hiring process is conducted through Friday, and you will be employed directly by Pagero. Since you will be working with insight into financial processes, this recruitment requires a credit check and a criminal records check as part of the employment process.
  
  

**ADDITIONAL INFORMATION:**  

**Start date:** Immediate/Upon agreed start date
  
**Employment type:** Full time
  
**Location:** Gothenburg, Västra Hamngatan 1
  
**Contac person:** Stina Högström
  
**Salary:** Fixed monthly
  
  

Apply by clicking the link below. Remember to be quick with your application as we make continuous selection of candidates and the position can be filled before the application deadline is due.
  
  

**ABOUT FRIDAY:**  

By being a partner to our clients and candidates, we strive to find the best match for you both. We achieve this by really getting to know our clients and candidate’s needs! Of course, we will ensure that requirements and skillsets match. But above all, we focus on the importance to find harmony between values ​​and corporate culture which both candidate and client considers optimal.
  
  

Our passion is to help people to the right position, workplace and context and we work in the field between IT and Technology. That's why we founded Friday, with the ambition to help you with the job that gives you the Friday feeling - every day!
  
  

We mainly focusing on young engineers who are at the beginning of their careers or soon concluding college / university within the IT and Technology field.
  
  

Our belief is that people reach their fullest potential when looking forward to going to work each morning. "Friday - everyday", how about that?

title: 2nd Line Technical Support Agent to TaxiCaller
description:
TaxiCaller is on a mission to transform the transportation industry, providing our cloud services to taxi and bus companies around the world. We grow at a good pace and we are profitable.
  
We are now looking for a new 2nd line support person to our growing customer support team in Linköping.
  
  

About you
  
* You have excellent problem-solving skills and the ability to think “outside the box”.
* You possess great computing skills and are interested in all things technical.
* You provide a high level of customer service and have a full understanding of its importance.
* You are a curious and fast learner.
* You communicate clearly, both verbally and in writing (fluency in English is a requirement).


This is considered an entry-level position and although we don’t believe that you need specific qualifications to succeed in this role, it is very important that you are interested in tech, and have a basic understanding of computing, cloud-based services, and mobile technology.
  
  

About the position
  
As a 2nd line support agent, no two days will look the same. Your daily focus will be advising and guiding our 1st line support team, providing them with advanced technical support and assisting them with account management. Over time, you will become an expert in the system and point of contact for anyone internally, you’ll be providing operational and technical support to teams across all of our departments.
  
  

Your daily tasks will include
  
* Providing operational, technical and account management support to our 1st line support, sales and KAM teams.
* Supporting our marketing team in content creation, ensuring technical accuracy.
* Supporting our sales teams in sales demos and general technical support.
* Content creation for support resources such as user guides and manual inserts.
* Quality assurance and the development of internal training material.
* Contribution to developing new internal processes and policies.


It will be considered an advantage if
  
* You speak additional languages, especially Swedish, Finnish, French, or Spanish.
* You have experience in technical support, ideally in an international environment.
* You have a basic understanding of software, APIs and mobile applications.


This is a great opportunity to work as part of an ambitious team whose goals are centred around growth and scalability with a strong focus on the customer experience. Your efforts will have a direct influence on how we develop and you will help to shape TaxiCaller for the future. We’re a young company and the possibilities and career opportunities will only grow along with our success.
  
  

**You can learn more about working with us here:** https://www.taxicaller.com/en/careers and here www.linkedin.com/company/taxicaller.
  
Recruitment will continue until we feel we’ve found the right fit, so we recommend applying as soon as possible and we look forward to hearing from you!

title: Information Security Specialist
description:
Want to be part of transforming road freight – for good? Einride is showing the world a new way to move, based on the latest digital, electric and autonomous technologies. Through our offering – freight capacity as a service – we enable businesses around the world to accelerate towards their sustainability goals.
  
Founded in 2016, Einride became the first company in the world to deploy a cab-less autonomous electric vehicle on a public road (Sweden, 2019). In 2022, we were the first to successfully operate such a vehicle on a US public road. Today, we are a team of more than 500 people, and our award-winning technology is being deployed across 8 countries (and counting). Our clients include some of the world’s biggest shippers, including Fortune 500 companies.
  
  

**What you’ll do:**  

Improve and expand Einride's ISMS (i.e., security policies, guidelines & procedures)
  
Design and implement pragmatic processes which can practically improve the security posture of the organization (e.g., access reviews, enterprise risk management framework, etc)
  
Document and improve Einride's enterprise security architecture
  
Maintain the organization’s ISO27001 certification and prepare it for additional ones in the future (e.g., SOC2 Type I & Type II)
  
Perform Risk Management (including for 3rd-parties) and Business Continuity assessments, drive processes and controls that reduce risk for the organization and instill a sense of risk ownership to relevant stakeholders
  
  

**What we’re looking for:**  

Working experience in (preferably leading) compliance to security industry standards (ISO27001, PCI-DSS, SOC2, etc)
  
Experience in creating information security processes that work well for cloud corporate environments & applications (e.g., Google Workspace, Office365) and public cloud infrastructure (AWS, GCP, Azure, etc)
  
Ability to explain security principles and procedures to a diverse group of people in a way that allows them to make practical and informed decisions, without an overuse of jargon
  
  

This position is based in Stockholm or Gothenburg. We recommend you submit your application as soon as possible as selection and interviews are held continually.
  
At Einride, we are innovators, building solutions the world has never seen before – but urgently needs. That’s why we take action, and it’s why we are always eager to be challenged. We know that our best innovations come from having a diverse mix of people, including those of different experiences, career paths, and walks of life. By coming together and sharing our perspectives openly – by disagreeing, discussing, and committing – we deliver greater impact.
  
Please note that as part of our standard recruitment process, we conduct a background control on the final candidate for this role. This may include verification of education, employment history, any relevant professional certifications or other information that may be of our interest.

title: IFS Application Analyst
description:
*Vi tror att framsteg och möjligheter skapas bäst tillsammans. Välkommen till en plats där samarbete gör skillnad.*

  

Din roll


Vi behöver stärka vårt team – ta nästa steg i din karriär tillsammans med oss! Vi söker flera personer till rollen som IFS Business Analyst. Med dina IFS-kunskaper kommer du att bli en viktig del i vårt team och i framtagandet av morgondagens systemlösningar på Saab.


Som Business Analyst kommer du att fokusera på verksamhetens behov, utmaningar och möjligheter. Rollen går ut på att stötta med att konceptualisera och formulera insikter, och att nå konsensus med relevanta intressenter om vad som behöver göras och hur vägen dit ser ut.


Du blir en del av ett team som arbetar med förvaltning och utveckling av IFS Cloud. Teamet hanterar verksamhetsutveckling, förvaltning och avancerad problemlösning. Vi följer IFS kadens med uppdateringar i våra installationer och kommer att arbeta aktivt med att föra ut nya förmågor i systemet till verksamheten. Beroende på de kunskaper och erfarenheter du tar med dig kan du få en junior eller senior roll i vårt team.


Du kommer att arbeta inom sektionen ERP Applications inom Group IT som tillhör avdelningen Business Applications. Sektionen består av cirka 25 personer som arbetar med Saabs IFS-lösningar på olika sätt: applikationsexperter, utvecklare, tekniker och arkitekter.


Din profil


Det viktigaste du har med dig är dina erfarenheter av och kunskaper inom ett eller flera områden inom IFS Applications. I det här fallet letar vi efter kunskaper inom Manufacturing och/eller Supply Chain i IFS. Du har erfarenhet av och ett genuint intresse för IFS som systemlösning och för att utveckla en verksamhet med hjälp av den.

  

Du tycker om att använda din analytiska förmåga och tänker gärna nytt och hittar lösningar på utmaningar och problem när dom uppstår. Du kan analysera en kravbild men också våga ifrågasätta och komma med förbättringsförslag.


Du är en driven team-player som trivs tillsammans med andra men också i en roll där tätt samarbete varvas med självständigt arbete. Som person är du driven, engagerad, arbetar mot mål och fokuserar på resultat.

  

Du behöver ha:

* Kunskaper i IFS Applications inom Manufacturing och/eller Supply Chain
* Systemvetar- eller civilingenjörsutbildning eller motsvarande erfarenhet
* Arbetat med verksamhetsutveckling kopplat till affärssystem
* Erfarenhet av arbete i komplexa verksamheter
* Mycket god förmåga att kommunicera muntligt och skriftligt på svenska och engelska


Erfarenhet som projekt- eller delprojektledare är meriterande. Våra mer seniora Business Analysts tar stort ansvar och hamnar ofta på ledande och drivande positioner.


Tjänsten är placerad antingen Linköping, Jönköping eller Göteborg.

  

Vänligen observera att vi arbetar med löpande urval och tjänsten kan komma att tillsättas innan sista ansökningsdatum har gått ut.


Befattningen kräver att du genomgår och godkänns enligt vid var tid gällande bestämmelser för säkerhetsskydd. För befattningar där Saab har krav på säkerhetsklassinplacering kan, i förekommande fall, medföra krav på visst medborgarskap.

  

Vad du blir en del av


Bakom våra innovationer finns alla de som har gjort det möjligt. Modiga pionjärer och kluriga tänkare. Vardagshjältar och kreativa problemlösare. De som delar djup kunskap och de som utforskar nya områden. Och alla däremellan.


Här har du chansen att påverka och bidra på ditt unika sätt. Allt från att utveckla kod och bygga imponerande försvars- och säkerhetslösningar till att ta en kaffe med en kollega. Varje bidrag räknas. Vi ger dig möjlighet att anta utmaningar och skapa smarta innovationer. I vår vänliga och tekniksmarta värld finns plats för dig att växa. Vi finns här för att tillsammans skapa trygghet för människor och samhällen.


Saab är ett ledande försvars- och säkerhetsföretag med uppdrag att hjälpa nationer att skydda sin befolkning och bidrar till trygghet för människor och samhällen. Med 22 000 talangfulla medarbetare utvecklar Saab teknik och lösningar för en säkrare och mer hållbar värld.


Saab utvecklar, tillverkar och underhåller avancerade system inom flygteknik, vapen, ledningssystem, sensorer och undervattenssystem. Saab har sitt huvudkontor i Sverige men en global verksamhet där Saab är en del av många nationers försvarsförmåga. Läs mer om oss här
company_description: Saab serves the global market with world-leading products, services and solutions from military defense to civil security.

title: Managing IA konsult med ledaransvar
description:
***Drivs du av att skapa förändring och att förbättra organisationers faktiska förmåga att utvecklas digitalt? Då tycker jag att DU ska läsa noga nu.***

***Vi söker dig som vill kombinera driv och nyfikenhet för den nya teknikens möjligheter med ett starkt engagemang att leda och utveckla andra. Som Managing IA Konsult inom området Intelligent Automation får du utveckla affärsområdet, delta i säljarbetet och leda ett team av utvecklare, business analysts och arkitekter. Uppdraget är att stötta deras utveckling och kompetens samtidigt som du själv får medverka och påverka hur och vad vi säljer i området samt hur det levereras. Vi erbjuder en omväxlande roll där utvecklingen av personal och verksamhet är i fokus men där även DU kommer utvecklas som ledare och ta nästa steg i din karriär.***

**Din roll finns inom vårt affärsområde C&CA (Cloud & Custom Application) som utvecklar kundernas framtida tjänster för den digitala kundupplevelsen och allt som stödjer dem. Vi jobbar med stora globala företag och svenska myndigheter genom att erbjuda dem tjänster för hela livscykeln, från strategi och planering till realisering och förvaltning, och verkar som en tillförlitlig partner till dem.**

**Du blir också en del av Capgeminis globala nätverk med mer än 350 000+ kollegor i fler än 40 länder samt vårt globala och lokala nätverk inom Intelligent Automation.**

**Om rollen:**

**I leveranserna har du ett nära samarbete med kundansvariga. Du deltar aktivt i försäljning och affärsutveckling tillsammans med vårt etablerade Center Of Excellence.**

**Som** **Managing IA Konsult med ledaransvar** **arbetar du med att vidareutveckla både personal och verksamhet. En del av din tid kommer ägnas åt att vara ledare för dina konsulter där du stödjer, coachar och är ett bollplank för dem. En del att arbeta i leveransprojekt som senior konsult eller projektledare.**

**Du kommer att tillhöra ledningsgruppen för affärsområdet och blir en viktig del i den operativa ledningen och i affärsplanering.**

**Ditt ansvar:**

* **Ansvar för affärsutveckling, att driva tillväxt och rekrytera nya förmågor till gruppen.**
* **Ansvar för att gruppens konsulter har rätt kompetens i förhållande till vår kunders behov och vår framtida strategiska riktning.**
* **Ansvar för kostnads- och intäktsbudget.**
* **Ansvar för beläggning och lönsamhet för gruppen.**
* **Formellt personalansvar inklusive lönesättning och kompetensutveckling.**

**Vem är du?**

**Du har flera års erfarenhet som senior konsult. Vi tror att du har stor erfarenhet som ledare och även haft personalansvar eller så kommer du från en roll som exempelvis senior projektledare, teamledare eller gruppchef/konsultchef på ett annat bolag. Du har också goda kunskaper inom affärsutveckling, troligen har du en relevant akademisk högskoleexamen eller motsvarande erfarenhet i bagaget och är f** **lytande i svenska och engelska** **.**

**Du har goda kunskaper inom verksamhetsutveckling och ledarskap och har förståelse för nyttan med teknologier som exempelvis** ***RPA, Machine Learning, Intelligent Document Processing, Conversational Intelligence*** **etc. Du blir framgångsrik i denna roll om du har:**

* **Insikt i och kunskap om hur man bygger organisationer samt sätter ihop leveransteam inom digitala transformationsprojekt med modern teknik.**
* **Förmåga att förklara tekniska lösningar på ett sätt som skapar förståelse såväl hos kunder som internt på Capgemini.**

**Vi söker dig som är nyfiken och dedikerad, som älskar att leda, motivera och inspirera dina medarbetare. Du har erfarenhet av ledarskap sedan tidigare men än viktigare är din kompetens i att kommunicera, motivera och utveckla andra och att få människor att prestera och trivas på jobbet. Du har lätt för att engagera dig i de kundbehov som finns för att möta en alltmer komplex digital kravbild. Du är affärsorienterad och uppskattar ett internationellt, varierande arbetsklimat där det händer mycket och där det finns goda chanser att påverka. Du är helt enkelt intresserad av både människan, teknologi och av att bidra i sälj och affärer.**

**Ansökan:** **Vi kommer att behandla ansökningar och intervjuer löpande, skicka gärna din ansökan så snart som möjligt, sista ansökningsdag är 31 juli.**
company_description: Capgemini is a global leader in partnering with companies to transform and manage their business by harnessing the power of technology.

title: Technical Information Security Officer
description:
Are you our new colleague in the Security Team?
  
  

The Security team at PwC is searching for a talented cybersecurity and technology professional to serve as a Technical Security Officer (TISO). Are you passionate about cyber or information security and are looking to advance your career? Read below to understand how you can influence our information security strategy and contribute to a sustainable and secure business environment.
  
Operating on a local, regional and global scale, Network Information Security (NIS) is responsible for the definition of our security strategy to hands on execution of our global Cyber Readiness Program, moving from predominantly local to centralized services. The local component supports this local, regional, and global operation.
  
As part of the Chief Information Security Officer (CISO) team in PwC Sweden, you'll work as part of a team of problem solvers, helping to solve complex business problems. PwC Professional skills and responsibilities for this role include but are not limited to:
  
  

Your Main Tasks
  
  

* Advisory - As a TISO within the CISO team, you will be responsible for advising on security solutions to local technology challenges, setting IT security standards and providing local requirements to our global security organization.
* Collaboration - You support technology and product teams in integrating security-related requirements into their products and ensuring that they comply with security requirements. Your daily tasks also include supporting the implementation of global security programs and the dissemination of security concepts and methods such as Application security.
* Mission Driven - Our mission is to identify, control and reduce the attack surface to make PwC resilient against cyber attacks. To do this, we work closely with our IT and product teams to ensure that IT security requirements are implemented and to integrate security into their daily work from the start.
* Continuous Improvement - You identify and establish security requirements and standards to unlock the use of existing service offerings and identify opportunities to improve the level of protection, pragmatically.


Qualifications for the position
  
  

* You have a thorough understanding and hands-on experience in at least three of the following security areas: Cloud Security, Network Security, Endpoint Security, Application Security, Secure Software Development, Identity & Access Management and Data Security.
* You are capable of evaluating the architectural design of IT systems from a security perspective and can answer technical questions about security solutions.
* You can translate specific security requirements and risks into a business context and act as a technical expert.
* You are fluent in spoken and written English


**We would prefer if you:**  

* are also fluent in spoken and written Swedish
* have special interest in emerging technologies and threats.
* are able to identify and prioritize problems and make quick and informed decisions.


Application
  
  

Welcome with your application to us. We will review applications continuously, and the position may be filled earlier than the application deadline.
  
  

**Please attach the following documents to your application:**  

* CV
* Cover letter


Recruitment Process
  
We believe in the strength of having a recruitment process that applies to everyone. As part of the selection, we use psychometric tests to ensure an objective, unbiased, and fair selection. The tests are the first step in our selection process. You will receive a link to these tests after we have received your application.
  
We value the personal meeting to understand the value you can bring to PwC and what we can offer you. The interview process usually consists of multiple stages and various types of interviews. When meeting with HR, you will have a competency-based interview where we examine the personality test you completed before the interview. During the interview with the business, you will have the opportunity to meet with the relevant team to discuss the role. We call for interviews continuously, and we encourage you to apply as soon as possible.
  
  

For questions regarding the position please contact the hiring manager at: fred.lamartin@pwc.com. For questions regarding the recruitment process, please contact the responsible recruiter at: hasse.karlberg@pwc.com.
  
  

We welcome all applications regardless of gender or gender identity, age, cultural and social background, ethnic origin, mental and physical abilities or sexual orientation.
  
  

PwC Sweden is the market leader within auditing and advisory services with more than 3,000 employees across Sweden – we are where you are! Our purpose is to build trust in society and solve important problems and our values permeate everything we do.
  
  

We are proactive advisors who are driven by understanding you and our other 24,000 clients’ real needs and finding solutions to complex business challenges – no matter what phase your business is in. What makes us unique is that we combine the latest technology with collaboration between our specialists. We are a community of solvers who stay with you all the way!
  
  

PwC Sweden is an independent legal entity that is part of the global PwC network with 364,000 employees in 151 countries. This allows us to share knowledge and experiences globally and deliver relevant solutions together that create trust and long-term sustainable value for our clients as well as society at large.
company_description: At PwC, it’s people + technology. In addition to positions in our audit, tax and consulting services, we are recruiting for a diverse range of products and technology roles.
ceo_name: Robert E. Moritz | Chairman PwC International Ltd

title: Full-stack engineer | Inter IKEA Data & Technology Range
description:
**Job ID:** REF18551B


**Date posted:** 01/07/2024


**Company description**  

Calling all Full-stack Software Engineers geniuses eager to challenge old truths! If you have an unstoppable passion for creating amazing software, we want to chat with you. (Bonus points for a genuine interest in Scandinavian home furnishing!)  

  

We’re on the lookout for Software Engineers that have experience in various programming languages, as well as an understanding of software development principles - here’s your chance to really make a difference and contribute to global solutions on a worldwide scale.  



  

**Job description**  

As a Software Engineer at IKEA Core Business Range, you work on projects that could change the world of affordable home furnishing and in teams that values innovation and creativity.


You will be working with modern technologies and frameworks, using your skills to create software products that are easy to use, visually stunning, and most importantly, accessible. In addition, you will be surrounded by equally skilled colleagues and teams who like to have fun, love a good laugh, and celebrate success big time!

**Your main focus will be**:

* Develop and maintain web applications and digital products, including internal tools for product development.
* Work on both frontend and backend tasks.
* Design and manage databases.
* Ensure security and performance of applications.
* Collaborate with cross-functional teams.

 **Qualification**  

Here are our expectations:

* Proficiency in various software domains.
* Skills in a diverse range of technologies, such as Typescript, Node.js, Java, C#, .NET, React.js, Fastify, and more.
* Solid understanding and hands-on experience with Docker, CI/CD processes, and Cloud services, with expertise in platforms like Azure, GCP, or others.
* Well-versed in database technologies, including MongoDB, Postgres DB, and Azure Cosmos DB.


Get ready to dive deep into our technology stack, and most importantly, enjoy the journey!

 **More Information** **About IKEA Core Business Range**  

At Core Business Range, we are ready to put in the next gear of moving IKEA and making us better together. We have decided that we will focus, simplify and concentrate going forward by putting the product in the center - with a full focus on the core of our assignments.  

  

Our business is about developing products, it's at the center of all that we do, our daily job. We are looking for you, who love working with the IKEA range, is passionate about Home furnishing and the business we're in and enthusiastic about solving real needs in people's homes. You will be important on our journey where we have decided to dare to be IKEA, optimize for relevance and have the best possible products at lowest possible price. Read more about us here: https://www.inter.ikea.com/  

  

This is a full-time position located in Malmö. We understand the importance of balance between work and personal life and are therefore able to offer you flexibility.  

  

As you might know, in Sweden it's common to take a few weeks of holiday during July, most people take over multiple weeks in a row; at IKEA we're no different. We believe in a healthy work-life balance and encourage our co-workers to take time to relax, recharge, and unwind. Because of this great benefit, the recruitment process might take a bit longer.  

Questions about the recruitment process can be answered by Aorui via aorui.pu1@inter.ikea.com  

  

*About Inter IKEA Group*  

*Inter IKEA Group is the group of companies that connects IKEA franchisees with range development and suppliers and aligns the overall IKEA strategic direction. All to create a better everyday life for the many people. The Group includes Inter IKEA Systems B.V. – the worldwide IKEA franchisor – as well as range development, Supply and certain industry activities.*
company_description: At IKEA, we share an inspiring vision: “to create a better everyday life for the many people”.

title: Open job application
description:
Calling all experienced engineers, problem solvers and technology nerds in Gothenburg!


Qamcom is growing and we are now making a massive push to recruit senior talent in embedded hardware, software and system development.


If you share our passion for solving complex real-life problems and think a rewarding day at work is when you manage to make something work and learn something new, then you should join us.

**What we offer**
-----------------

* The possibility to join product development projects in different sectors from an early idea stage to the commercial deployment of complete systems
* A cohort of senior developers and colleagues across our sites in Sweden, plus three international ones
* A role-based organization with a slimmer decision-making process and increased individual autonomy and responsibility

**What we expect**
------------------


In order to succeed at Qamcom, you need to be curious and self-driven; you have the ambition to put your competence to good use and further develop your skills. You are used to working in an environment where you quickly need to familiarize yourself with unknown areas, and can work independently but also as part of a cross-functional team, spread over different sites.

**Baseline Qualifications and Experience:**

  

* 6+ years of relevant industrial experience or a PhD in a relevant subject
* Fluency in English
* Swedish resident or Swedish work permit

**Meriting:**

* Experience with Industrial AI and IoT, signal- and image processing, MedTech
* Experience with embedded systems
* Experience with Cloud architecture
* Experience with Cybersecurity
* Customer-facing experience
* Working proficiency in Swedish

**About Qamcom**
----------------


Qamcom is a world-class solution provider in the field of embedded systems. Our ambition is to create value through technology. Our strength lies in the fact that

* we only hire senior developers,
* we have the competence in-house to build complete systems, including SW and algorithm development, electronics, mechanics, optics, as well as wireless connectivity and cloud,
* we join our clients and partners early on in the problem-solving cycle, and often take a project all the way from a very early-stage idea to a solution ready for commercial deployment.


At Qamcom, we believe diversity is good for business as it drives innovative thinking and improves the quality of our work. We also place a high value on having fun and enjoying what we do, individually and together.

title: Junior Support Engineer  - IT Helpdesk
description:
We are currently seeking a dedicated Support Engineer to join our team in Stockholm, taking on the role of the first line of support for our digital workplace at TF Bank. This position involves managing the IT Helpdesk, addressing daily IT tasks, and supporting various digital workplace solutions such as orders, team rooms, and printer systems.
   

  

**Key Responsibilities:**
* Provide first-line support for the IT Helpdesk, addressing daily IT tasks.
* Manage and support digital workplace solutions, including orders, team rooms, and printer solutions.
* Work with ticket systems to address user issues and requests.
* Handle flows, forms, automation, approval processes, and traceability.
* Manage orders and liaise with suppliers as needed.
* Troubleshoot IT-related problems and implement solutions.
* Perform patch management to ensure systems are up to date and secure.
* Implement and maintain IT security measures.
* Assist with client installations, Autopilot, Intune, Entra ID, and Active Directory (AD).
* Facilitate communication related to IT issues.
* Assist with on-boarding and off-boarding processes for employees.
* Manage changes of role within the IT system.


**Qualifications and Experience:**
* Previous experience in IT support roles, with a focus on daily IT tasks.
* Familiarity with ticket systems for issue tracking and resolution.
* Proficient in working with flows, forms, automation, approval processes, and traceability.
* Experience in managing orders, suppliers, and troubleshooting IT issues.
* Knowledge of patch management and implementing IT security measures.
* Experience with client installations, Autopilot, Intune, Entra ID, and Active Directory (AD).
* Strong communication skills in English and Swedish.
* Familiarity with Jira and Confluence.
* Proven experience as a Support Engineer.


 TF Bank values a diverse workforce, fostering a better working environment and promoting creativity. We know that good ideas can come anytime and anywhere and therefore we encourage everyone to contribute and be innovative. If you enjoy being where the action is, and want to make a difference, you will feel at home with us. We want you to enjoy working with us and therefore we offer benefits such as flexible working remotely, morning fika every day, sometimes even Friday cake, and fitness allowance.

title: Data Lead
description:
***This inclusive employer is a member of myGwork – the largest global platform for the LGBTQ+ business community.***
 EQT recognizes that Diversity, Equity & Inclusion (DE&I) have a positive impact on both EQT’s investors, employees and society. We strive to attract top talent representing diversity of backgrounds, experiences, perspectives, and opinions as this is vital to building better businesses, engaging talent, and driving high performance and financial returns.
   

  

 Client Tech Data Lead - Role Description
   

  

**Do you want to be a part of building the future digital experience for EQTs investors? We are now looking for a full-time Tech Lead within Data / Data Lead to our Client Tech Value Stream with the mission to create and deliver a best-in class client experience for EQTs investors.**
**Why EQT**
 If you are passionate about technology, want to challenge the status quo and be challenged every day, EQT is the place for you. We are a purpose-driven global investment organisation focused on active ownership strategies. With a Nordic heritage and a global mindset, EQT has a track record of three decades of delivering consistent and attractive returns across multiple geographies, sectors and strategies. EQT has investment strategies covering all phases of a business’ development, from start-up to maturity. EQT today has EUR 132 billion in fee-generating assets under management, within two business segments – Private Capital and Real Assets.
   

  

**What You Will Do**
 The Client Data Lead has the responsibility for the Client Tech data domain, which demands having a deep understanding of the data, including the producers and consumers of data within the domain, and drive data related improvements. As a lead within the Client Tech Value Stream, the Data Lead prioritise improvements, work together with the relevant teams, and has the mandate to deliver on the agreed plan.
   

  

* Lead a newly formed Client Tech Data group operating within a data mesh framework.
* Set & anchor the Client Tech Data strategy with corresponding architecture
* Play an active part of the EQT Tech Data Lead group and contribute to evolving the EQT Tech Data Strategy
* Set, anchor and deliver on the tactical roadmap for Client Tech Data
* Lead with the migration and enhancement of underlying data transformations using dbt.
* Lead the end-to-end development of domain data products, from ingestion, data transformations, to data sets and data visualisations.
* Collaborate closely with Client Tech Lead, Architect and Team Leads to prioritise and plan the work for you and your team.
* Collaborate closely with key business stakeholders, and help them translating their data needs into actionable insights.
* Lead and be responsible for continuous improvements of all Client Tech Data assets


**Tech stack**
 The below list is not exhaustive nor is it a prerequisite to know all of it for the position as tech lead. Emphasis will be placed on learning new technologies and environments fast and get up to speed quickly.
   

  

* Dbt
* Snowflake
* Salesforce & CRM Analytics
* SQL
* Fivetran
* Terraform
* BI tools such as PowerBI and Hex


**Facts about the team**
**The Client Data Team**
* Data Lead
* 3 Data Engineers within Client Tech
* Reporting to: Client Tech Lead
* Closest collaborators: Client Tech Team & Tech Leads, Client Tech Architect, other Data Leads, key Business stakeholders


**We’d Love To Meet Someone**
* Who has a successful track record in roles such as Data lead, senior Data engineer or Analytics/BI roles
* Who feels comfortable driving best practices in a large development team, and has experience working with change management
* Who loves both tech and business, and thrives connecting the two disciplines.
* With great leadership and communication skills


**Preferably You Also Have**
* Experience working with data mesh strategies and turning strategy into delivery
* Experience leading highly skilled professionals to deliver as a team


**What’s in it for me?**
 EQT is a well established company that has worked within its field for a long time. Being one of Europe's largest Private Equity firms you will get a stable employer, being proved by EQTs continued growth during the last years of market turbulence. Due to this, EQT offers attractive compensation packages, with an internal career framework giving you the opportunity to grow within the company. It also includes generous pensions, 6 weeks vacation and a great health care allowance. If you have small children, we also offer a domestic allowance program to enable a good work/life balance. There are of course more benefits on top of this, which we would be happy to tell you about when we meet!
   

  

 EQT is a purpose-driven global investment organization focused on active ownership strategies. With a Nordic heritage and a global mindset, EQT has a track record of almost three decades of delivering consistent and attractive returns across multiple geographies, sectors and strategies. EQT has investment strategies covering all phases of a business’ development, from start-up to maturity. EQT has EUR 232 billion in total assets under management (EUR 128 billion in fee-generating assets under management), within two business segments – Private Capital and Real Assets.
   

  

 With its roots in the Wallenberg family’s entrepreneurial mindset and philosophy of long-term ownership, EQT is guided by a set of strong values and a distinct corporate culture. EQT manages and advises funds and vehicles that invest across the world with the mission to future-proof companies, generate attractive returns and make a positive impact with everything EQT does.
   

  

 The EQT AB Group comprises EQT AB (publ) and its direct and indirect subsidiaries, which include general partners and fund managers of EQT funds as well as entities advising EQT funds. EQT has offices in more than 20 countries across Europe, Asia and the Americas and has more than 1,800 employees.
   

  

 More info: www.eqtgroup.com
   

  

 For more business updates follow EQT on LinkedIn, X, YouTube and Instagram

title: Automation Developer
description:
**Job Title: Automation Developer / Technical Lead** 




  





**Job Summary:** 




 We are seeking a skilled and experienced Technical Lead to join our team. The ideal candidate should have a strong background in automation development, proficiency in various programming languages, and extensive experience in database management and CI/CD pipeline development. This role requires excellent problem-solving abilities, effective communication skills, and a collaborative mindset to drive our projects to success.
 



  





**Role Description:** 




 - Bachelor's degree in Computer Science, Information Technology, or a related field, or equivalent work experience.
 



 - Minimum of 3 years of experience in automation development.
 



 - Strong proficiency in Python, PHP, and TypeScript.
 



 - Experience with MySQL and database management.
 



 - Hands-on experience with GitLab for CI/CD pipeline development and management.
 



 - Proficiency in Kubernetes for container orchestration and management.
 



 - Knowledge of best practices in DevOps and automation.
 



 - Excellent problem-solving skills and attention to detail.
 



 - Strong communication and collaboration skills.
 



 - Experience with other CI/CD tools like Jenkins or Circle CI.
 



 - Familiarity with cloud platforms such as AWS, Azure, or Google Cloud.
 



 - Knowledge of infrastructure as code (IaC) tools like Terraform or Ansible.
 



 - Understanding of microservices architecture and containerization.
 



  





**Competencies:** 




  





 - Digital: HYBRID App Development
 



 - Digital: Python
 



 - Digital: Kubernetes
 



 - MySQL
 



 - PHP Web Programming
 



  





**Experience:** 




  





 - 8-10 years of relevant experience
 



  





**Essential Skills:** 




  





 - Python
 



 - TypeScript
 



 - PHP
 



 - MySQL
 



 - GitLab
 



 - Kubernetes
 



  





**Desirable Skills:** 




  





 - Any other Object-Oriented Programming language
 



  





**Qualifications:** 




  





 - Bachelor's degree in Computer Science, Information Technology, or a related field, or equivalent work experience.
 



 - Minimum of 3 years of experience in automation development.
 



 - Strong proficiency in Python, PHP, and TypeScript.
 



 - Experience with MySQL and database management.
 



 - Hands-on experience with GitLab for CI/CD pipeline development and management.
 



 - Proficiency in Kubernetes for container orchestration and management.
 



 - Knowledge of best practices in DevOps and automation.
 



 - Excellent problem-solving skills and attention to detail.
 



 - Strong communication and collaboration skills.
 



 - Experience with other CI/CD tools like Jenkins or CircleCI.
 



 - Familiarity with cloud platforms such as AWS, Azure, or Google Cloud.
 



 - Knowledge of infrastructure as code (IaC) tools like Terraform or Ansible.
 



 - Understanding of microservices architecture and containerization.
 



  





 This role offers the opportunity to lead and influence key projects while working with cutting-edge technologies and a dynamic team. If you are a motivated and experienced Technical Lead, we encourage you to apply and contribute to our success.

title: Digital solution consultant process performance
description:
***This inclusive employer is a member of myGwork – the largest global platform for the LGBTQ+ business community.***
 This position reports to
   

  

 Principal Technical Consultant
   

  

 Your role and responsibilities
   

  

 In this role, you will have the opportunity to drive the execution of the digital ecosystem strategy in the assigned area. Each day, you will support in developing and implementing a comprehensive digital ecosystem, covering one or more specific assigned such as channels and partnerships for co-creation, onboarding, and monitoring solutions on ABB marketplace. You will also showcase your expertise by demonstrating a solid understanding of digitalization needs and trends in the industry and assigned aspects of the digital ecosystem. Capture market opportunities, understand customer drivers and digitalization needs, develop and evolve technology partnerships and translate these into a solution-based business strategy to leverage untapped digital value Develop and implement appropriate and often new business models for digital transformation opportunities in Process Performance (Advanced Process Control APC/MPC, Analytics, Performance Services, Simulation) with customers in all Process Industries verticals (Mining, Pulp & Paper, Metals, Food & Beverage) Analyzes customer requirements to ensure digital solution(s) meets objectives by combining industry best practices, product knowledge, and business acumen Acts as a high-level technical expert for the Process Performance portfolio across Process Industries verticals, providing knowledge and analysis of specialized software applications and operational environments, functional systems analysis, design, integration, and implementation advice for complex digital solution implementation Provides direction and mentoring to sales and project teams Interfaces with and influences customerâs senior technical and business leadership Continuously drives business development efforts by pursuing new opportunities and extensions with sales teams
   

  

**Qualifications For The Role**
* 5+ years of experience driving digital transformation in complex global organizations, ideally in a B2B environment (Process, Energy, software, technology, automation).
* Bachelorâs/Master's degree in Engineering, Computer Science, Software Engineering, or a related technical field.
* Hands-on experience in the OT/software industry with a focus on digitalization and Industrial Software. Deep understanding of relevant technologies and trends.
* Proven track record in consultative selling, with a strong customer focus, exposure to top management, driving results, building pipeline, and turning opportunities into sales successes.
* Ability to drive success in direct and matrix organizations.
* Thorough understanding of the industry customer's end-to-end digital journey through hands-on exposure to transformation planning initiatives. Implemented APC through a full lifecycle from requirements gathering to aftermarket support.
* Deep experience in the industrial software environment; division-specific industry exposure (industrial automation/advanced software) preferred; experience and background in one or more of the division industrial domains such as Mining, Pulp & Paper, Metals, Cement, Food & Beverage.
* Background in cloud and edge technologies, digital twins, analytics, artificial intelligence, and machine learning as applied to Process Performance solutions.
* Experience in the justification, design, implementation, and maintenance of process control applications.
* Understanding of pre-test, tuning, step testing, model identification, inferential deployment, interfacing, and commissioning.
* Excellent networking skills developed in a highly international organization, with a âleading by influenceâ approach.
* Fluency in English, both written and spoken, with additional languages being a plus.
* Availability to travel regionally as required.


 What's in it for you?
   

  

* Learn from highly experienced, genuine, and caring colleagues â people who are committed to helping you achieve your personal and professional goals.
* Help customers in driving efficiency and sustainability, making a strong impact
* Get exposed to cutting-edge technology in Process Automation and have a visible impact on the future


 More about us
   

  

 The Process Industries Division serves the mining, minerals processing, metals, cement, pulp and paper, battery manufacturing, and food and beverage, as well as their associated service industries. The Division brings deep industry domain expertise coupled with the ability to integrate both automation and electrical systems, increase productivity and reduce overall capital and operating costs for customers. For mining, metals and cement customers, solutions include specialized products and services, as well as total production systems. The Division designs, plans, engineers, supplies, installs and commissions integrated electrical and motion systems, including electric equipment, drives, motors, high power rectifiers and equipment for automation and supervisory control within a variety of areas including mineral handling, mining operations, aluminum smelting, hot and cold steel applications and cement production. The offering for the pulp and paper industries includes control systems, quality control systems, drive systems, on-line sensors, actuators and field instruments. Digitalization solutions, including collaborative operations and augmented reality, help improve plant and enterprise productivity, and reduce maintenance and energy costs. We value people from different backgrounds. Apply today for your next career step within ABB and visit www.abb.com to learn about the impact of our solutions across the globe. #MyABBStory

title: Translation Analyst- Graduate Program
description:
***This inclusive employer is a member of myGwork – the largest global platform for the LGBTQ+ business community.***
 IPS provides translation solutions for Oracle products. Language Solutions ensure that Oracle users experience high quality usability in their own language – in any of the more than 40 languages Oracle offers. A globally distributed team of Language Specialists enables a network of translation partners to meet linguistic market requirements and standards. By driving and using latest language technologies, tools and processes, Language Solutions achieves high language quality with short time to market and at competitive cost.
   

  

**Key Responsibilities Include, But Are Not Limited To**
**Create and maintain language standards for Oracle products that meet local market requirements**
* Capture local language standards and market requirements, develop and maintain language-specific reference material, such as style guides, glossaries and other language-related specifications to be used by translation partners.
* Establish feedback mechanisms with Oracle experts and Oracle product users to ensure language standards meet market expectations. Manage user expectations.
* Maintain Language Dashboard and market priority data to drive language investments and corrective action.
* Support IPS Project Management on all language aspects of translation projects, to ensure a timely delivery of translated products with a quality that meets market requirements.


**Enable Translation Partners to Deliver Quality Translations**
* Monitor the need for quality controls and support, negotiate language improvement plans with translation vendors. Report and escalate performance issues.
* Perform quality control checks and linguistic testing on translated products as determined by product and vendor status analysis. Provide translation partners with detailed feedback to make sure translations meet market requirements and feedback supports the vendor learning curve.
* Support translation vendors in their day-to-day work on language, process and tools issues. Take decisions on terminology suggested by partners, answer product or Oracle specific questions
* Share relevant reference material about products and language specific items with the translation partners. Invites translation partners to participate in linguistic testing and local/global training to drive self-reliance and enable quality at source.
* Assist the Language Manager in building and developing a competitive, scalable and quality oriented translation vendor solution locally


**Maintain Language Assets & Integrate New Products**
* Support integration of existing, new or acquired products by validating legacy content and terminology. Provide input to leverage mechanisms and alignment of terminology as required.
* Maintain and develop core terminology for target language across all products and determine the adequate level of consistency depending on product integration path.
* Perform corrective actions on language repositories and fix language bugs.
* Participate in evaluating translation and terminology management tools and processes whenever applicable.


**Support ML Language and Data Services**
* Perform language evaluations on datasets and MT outputs.
* Support in the creation of linguistic rules or specific word lists for engine training.
* Contribute to Machine Learning projects.
* Participate in language testing of ML services, such as digital assistant


 Depending on experience, knowledge and interest, Language Specialists will be involved in non-language dependent tasks at global level and contribute to special projects or to the improvement of organizational processes.
   

  

* Degree in translation, linguistics, or related field.
* Exposure as a linguist, translator, language coordinator, project manager or localizer in an IT or other business environment.
* Quality assurance concepts and quality management.
* Knowledge of managing localization vendors or other service providers is an advantage.
* Knowledge or experience in machine translation, machine learning, language data creation, data annotation and natural language processing is an advantage.
* Knowledge or experience in one or more of Oracle’s target business areas is an advantage.
* Computer science or business qualification is an advantage


**Skills**
* Native language skills in the target language.
* Fluent verbal and written English.
* Good understanding of localization, translation, and terminology management processes.
* Ability to prioritize and meet commitments under continual deadline pressure.
* Excellent communication, organizational, interpersonal and teamwork skills.
* Flexibility and adaptability
* Ability to work independently, in a geographically dispersed environment.
* Drive for continuous learning and self-development.


 Career Level - IC2
   

  

 Works with localization teams to adapt material to meet high linguistic quality and cultural standards. Creates and maintains product specific terminology glossaries and language style guides to ensure consistency and cultural conformity. Some experience using translation, localization, or publication tools such as Trados, RoboHelp, or FrameMaker may be needed.
   

  

 As a world leader in cloud solutions, Oracle uses tomorrow’s technology to tackle today’s problems. True innovation starts with diverse perspectives and various abilities and backgrounds.
   

  

 When everyone’s voice is heard, we’re inspired to go beyond what’s been done before. It’s why we’re committed to expanding our inclusive workforce that promotes diverse insights and perspectives.
   

  

 We’ve partnered with industry-leaders in almost every sector—and continue to thrive after 40+ years of change by operating with integrity.
   

  

 Oracle careers open the door to global opportunities where work-life balance flourishes. We offer a highly competitive suite of employee benefits designed on the principles of parity and consistency. We put our people first with flexible medical, life insurance and retirement options. We also encourage employees to give back to their communities through our volunteer programs.
   

  

 We’re committed to including people with disabilities at all stages of the employment process. If you require accessibility assistance or accommodation for a disability at any point, let us know by calling +1 888 404 2494, option one.
   

  

**Disclaimer**
 Oracle is an Equal Employment Opportunity Employer\*. All qualified applicants will receive consideration for employment without regard to race, color, religion, sex, national origin, sexual orientation, gender identity, disability and protected veterans’ status, or any other characteristic protected by law. Oracle will consider for employment qualified applicants with arrest and conviction records pursuant to applicable law.
   

  

* Which includes being a United States Affirmative Action Employer

title: Konsultchef till Enterprise Applications
description:
***Vi på Nexer Enterprise Applications är konsulter med bred specialistkunskap och erfarenhet inom Microsoft Dynamics 365. Vill du arbeta på ett globalt företag i framkant som lägger stor vikt vid individens utveckling och ser mångfald som en tillgång? Just nu söker vi en relationsbyggande konsultchef till ett av våra Dynamics-team!***
***Är det du? Vänta inte med att söka!***
 Våra team växer och vi söker nu en ytterligare konsultchef som kan leda och stödja våra konsulter samt ansvara för rekrytering av nya härliga kollegor. Hos oss är det viktigt att trivas på jobbet och att dela en familjär atmosfär. Vi letar efter dig som vill bli en del av vårt team och bidra till att vi fortsätter vara det självklara valet för Sveriges bästa IT-konsulter inom Dynamics!
   

  

 Som en del av ett växande företag och en företagskultur präglad av innovation, passion och entreprenörskap, kommer du att spela en avgörande roll i vår verksamhet och bidra till vår fortsatta tillväxt och framgång. Vi strävar efter att vara den ledande rådgivande partnern till våra kunder, skapa innovativa och effektiva lösningar som bidrar till deras framgång.
   

  

**Hur ser rollen ut?**
 Konsultchef innebär att leda vårt team, samtidigt som du kan vara involverad i kunduppdrag, försäljning eller andra områden som intresserar dig. Du kommer också att ha ansvar för rekrytering av nya talanger, genomföra löne- och utvecklingssamtal samt säkerställa att våra medarbetare har rätt förutsättningar för att lyckas, både genom utveckling och coaching.
   

  

**Ort:** 
 Hybrid tjänst, våra härliga kollegor tillhör kontoren i Stockholm, Göteborg, Malmö, Eskilstuna och Västerås
   

  

**Start:** 
 Omgående
   

  

**Vem är du?**
 För oss är dina personliga egenskaper viktigast. Vi tror att du är en motiverande och inspirerande ledare med affärsorienterat tänkande och driv att driva förändring. Du är van vid att arbeta med olika intressenter och har erfarenhet från konsultbranschen.
   

  

 Vidare tror vi att du tidigare har arbetat med:
   

  

* Dynamics 365, gärna både Finance & Supply Chain Management och av CE apparna (Sales, Service, Field Service, Insight)
* Support- och förvaltningsprocesser, gärna ITIL
* Konsultroll, alternativt som Service Manager eller Projektledare
* Budget- och resultatansvar samt uppföljning
* Kundmöten / Pre-Sales
* Personalansvar


 Du har god kommunikativ förmåga på svenska och engelska, både i tal och skrift.
   

  

**Hur är det att arbeta på Nexer Enterprise Applications?**
 På Nexer Enterprise Applications arbetar du i en företagskultur som präglas av eget driv men samtidigt har du stöd från övriga delar av Nexer. Vi värdesätter en familjär kultur och en stark sammanhållning i teamen.
   

  

 Vi är en etablerad aktör inom Dynamics och Microsoft 365, både i Sverige och internationellt. Du får möjlighet att arbeta med både svenska och internationella kunder och bidra till deras framgång.
   

  

 Nexer Enterprise Applications består av mer än 450 experter, varav cirka 100 medarbetare i Sverige och 350 medarbetare i Storbritannien, Indien, Brasilien, Colombia, Portugal och USA.
   

  

 Här kan du läsa mer om oss: https://nexergroup.com/about-us/our-business-areas/ba-enterprise-applications/
   

  

**Vår kultur**
 Vår vision är "Promising future" – vi vill göra skillnad och bidra till en bättre framtid. Vi är engagerade i våra kunder och bryr oss om varandra. Vi omfamnar mångfald och tror att olika bakgrunder och erfarenheter berikar vårt arbete och företag. Vi värdesätter innovation och strävan efter att utvecklas och ta nästa steg – framåt och uppåt.
   

  

 Dessutom har vi roligt på jobbet! Vi har en entreprenöriell anda och firar våra framgångar genom regelbundna events, resor, teamaktiviteter och konferenser inom både vårt affärsområde och övriga Nexer Group.
   

  

**Ansökan**
 Du är varmt välkommen att skicka in din ansökan nedan. Vi tar endast emot ansökningar via formuläret och hanterar dem löpande. Har du frågor om tjänsten eller Nexer, kontakta gärna Maja Åström på Maja.astrom@nexergroup.com. Vänta inte med att söka!

title: AI or ML Engineer
description:
Are you looking for a role within an exciting world of AI technologies, where you can both contribute to the project with your expertise and keep on learning?
   

  

 We are starting a new chapter within ASSA ABLOY’s organization, and we are looking for top talent to help us grow our AI Technical Development Teams from scratch.
   

  

 Join our Team in Stockholm, Sweden and enjoy a collaborative culture that empowers you to build a career you can be proud of.
   

  

**What would you do as our AI or ML Engineer**
 We are looking for an AI generalist to join our brand new project related to AI Technical Development, together with our newly created Team of Engineers, based in Stockholm.
   

  

 We work in cross-functional teams, responsible for developing modern, secure and top-quality solutions. We develop embedded applications and integrate them with Mobile Applications, Electronic Access Control software using cloud and microservice architecture.
   

  

**You would also:**
* Stay up-to-date with the latest AI technologies.
* Be responsible for ML and GenAI development processes.
* Perform data preparation, validation, cleaning, testing.
* Be responsible for model training, deployment, tracking.


**The Skills And Experience You Need**
 We are looking for someone who:
   

  

* has previous experienced as an AI or ML engineer, including building data pipelines, training models or developing Gen AI LLM based apps and deploying them safely to production.
* has hands-on experience with MLOps and training modern ML models.
* is experienced in LLMs and other models, Gen AI and ‘Chatbots’.
* is experienced in Python, Jupyter, TensorFlow/PyTorch.
* has knowledge of Cloud infrastructure, data bases, CI/CD.
* is fluent in English, spoken and written.


**What We Offer**
 We’re passionate about providing amazing opportunities and benefits, so you can continue and progress a lifelong career with us – here’s what we have to offer:
   

  

* Learning and career development opportunities, whether it’s online learning, management training or enhancing your skills.
* A competitive salary and incentive schemes.
* Hybrid model of working.
* Flexible working hours.
* Stable employment in a friendly international atmosphere.


**We review applications regularly, so don’t wait**
 We are building diverse, inclusive teams, and encourage applications from everyone who can see themselves working with us. Just set up your profile and apply here, no later than 30th June 2024.
   

  

 To make sure your personal data is safe, we don’t look at any applications sent by email or post. If you have any questions about the role or the process, email Daria Skucha, Talent Acquisition Business Partner, at Daria.Skucha@assaabloy.com.
   

  

 Let’s create a safer and more open world - together!
   

  

 To find out more about us, visit www.assaabloy.com
   

  

**We are the ASSA ABLOY Group**
 Our people have made us the global leader in access solutions. In return, we open doors for them wherever they go. With nearly 61,000 colleagues in more than 70 different countries, we help billions of people experience a more open world. Our innovations make all sorts of spaces – physical and virtual – safer, more secure, and easier to access.
   

  

 As an employer, we value results – not titles, or backgrounds. We empower our people to build their career around their aspirations and our ambitions – supporting them with regular feedback, training, and development opportunities. Our colleagues think broadly about where they can make the most impact, and we encourage them to grow their role locally, regionally, or even internationally.
   

  

 As we welcome new people on board, it’s important to us to have diverse, inclusive teams, and we value different perspectives and experiences.

title: Konsult Azure
description:
Atea är Microsofts största partner i Norden och med starkt fokus på Azure. Vi strävar efter att leverera lösningar som ökar kundens effektivitet och skapar verklig verksamhetsnytta. Vi söker nu passionerade och erfarna Azure konsulter som brinner för att leda och modernisera våra kunders resa till och i molnet. Ta chansen att utvecklas professionellt och som individ hos oss på Atea!
   

  

 Din roll i laget
   

  

 I rollen som Azure konsult levererar du löningar inom Azure och har ett brinnande intresse för nya funktioner i publika molnet. Du samarbetar med dina kollegor och lutar dig mot vårt gemensamma ramverk som baseras på Microsofts CAF. Du är van att skapa och implementera robusta och skalbara Azurelösningar som uppfyller kundens krav och affärsbehov.
   

  

 Du blir del av vårt snabbt växande nationella team för Azure, i ett större team inom vår Cloudgruppering. Där kommer du får chansen att arbeta med kunder över hela landet och samarbeta med kollegor i hela Norden inom samma område. Du blir därmed en viktig pusslebit för oss i vår utökade satsning inom Azure. Placeringsort för denna roll är flexibel på det Ateakontor som ligger närmast dig.
   

  

 Ditt team och framtida chef
   

  

 En hälsning från din framtida chef~
   

  

 "Hej! Johan heter jag och kommer att vara din närmsta chef. I ett tätt samarbete med mig får du frihet under ansvar och min tillit i att driva arbetet med egna initiativ med mitt och teamets stöttning framåt. Jag är Konsultchef i vårt Cloud Center of Excellence som stödjer våra kunder i förflyttning och transformation till det publika molnet. Efterfrågan från våra kunder ökar och vi startar nu vårt nationella Arkitektteam. På Atea har vi två tydliga ramverk som vi arbetar efter, Atea CloudTrack, och Atea365 som du gärna kan läsa mer om HÄR."
   

  

 Vad vi söker hos dig
   

  

 Vi söker dig som har ett stort kundengagemang och ett arbetssätt som präglas av högt driv och positiv energi. Du har ett resultatinriktat synsätt med fokus på våra kunder och är duktig på att inspirera och skapa goda relationer.
   

  

 Att samarbeta med andra samt hantera flera uppgifter parallellt är helt avgörande för denna roll, du måste trivas i en sådan miljö och själv hitta en bra nivå på strukturen. Du är orädd i kundsituationer och du ser lätt hur saker hänger ihop samt förstår övergripande strategier och är duktig på att förmedla det. Du uppskattar möjligheten att möta nya kunder och arbeta i en varierande vardag. Du sätter höga mål för dig själv och söker aktivt utmaningar och utvecklingsmöjligheter. För att lyckas i tjänsten som Azure konsult ser vi att~
   

  

* Du har erfarenhet med Azure-plattformen
* Du är obehindrad i svenska och engelska i tal och skrift
* Meriterande~ Erfarenhet av Cloud Adoption Framework, Azure Migrate, Well Architected Framework och arkitektur i Azure
* Meriterande~ Certifieringar, en eller flera (AZ-104, AZ-500, AZ-300, AZ-305, SC-100)


 För att få engagerade kunder är vi övertygade om att det startar hos dig som är konsult. Du har även en förmåga att identifiera och lösa tekniska utmaningar på ett effektivt sätt. Azure är ett stort område och ingen kan kunna allt och därför är det viktigt att du kan samarbeta med olika team och kommunicera komplexa tekniska lösningar på ett begripligt sätt. Självklart är det viktigt att du har en ständig nyfikenhet att lära nytt och vilja utvecklas. Du strävar alltid efter att överträffa kundens förväntningar. Du har en analytisk förmåga och kan lösa komplexa utmaningar med kreativa lösningar.
   

  

 Vårt löfte till dig
   

  

 Hos oss får du vara med att bidra till ett smartare, effektivare och mer hållbart samhälle. Med fokus på utveckling, laganda och personligt ansvarstagande ser vi till att göra skillnad. Vi uppmuntrar och stöttar varandra, och tar vara på våra individuella förmågor, perspektiv och erfarenheter. Det är därför du är viktig för oss. För att du är du, för att du är nyfiken och för att du vill växa professionellt – och som människa. Tillsammans skapar vi laget som bygger Sverige med it.
   

  

 Dina förmåner
   

  

 Nedan är ett urval av förmåner hos oss. Atea har höga ambitioner, vi vill vara The Place To Be och branschens bästa arbetsgivare och vi arbetar ständigt med att, på olika sätt, verka för detta. Ateas filosofi om förmåner är att vi är ett lag och därför erbjuder vi alla medarbetare samma utbud.
   

  

* Hybrid arbetssätt med kundens, verksamhetens och medarbetarens behov i fokus
* Belöning via gemensam kvartalsbonus för samtliga medarbetare
* Fokus hälsa med engagerade träningsaktiviteter och friskvårdsbidrag
* Möjlighet att bli nominerad till Atea Champions Club och få åka på en konferensresa med andra kollegor
* Aktiespararprogram


 Kontakta oss & mer information
   

  

 Med anledning av kommande semesterperiod kan återkoppling på din ansökan och processen eventuellt dröja något längre än vanligt. Men ansök redan idag då tjänsten kan tillsättas innan sista ansökningsdatum.
   

  

 Har du frågor om tjänsten är du varmt välkommen att kontakta Johan Stenman, konsultchef, via johan.stenman@atea.se. Har du frågor om rekryteringsprocessen är du varmt välkommen att kontakta Fanny Sandberg, Talent Acquisition Partner, via fanny.sandberg@atea.se. Vi hanterar ansökningar löpande och tjänsterna kan tillsättas innan sista ansökningsdatum, ansök därmed redan idag!
   

  

 Nästa steg i processen består av ett kortare telefonsamtal där dina erfarenheter och kompetenser stäms av, du får även höra mer om tjänsten och ställa dina eventuella frågor. Som en kvalitativ del i vår rekryteringsprocess genomgår slutkandidater en bakgrundskontroll, detta för att öka kännedomen om dig som vår framtida medarbetare.
   

  

 Atea vill vara The Place To Be, den självklara platsen, för alla människor då vi värdesätter och jobbar aktivt med mångfald och inkludering.
   

  

 Varmt välkommen med din ansökan till oss!
   

  

*Med anledning av semesterperiod i sommar kan det dröja längre tid för dig att få återkoppling på din ansökan. Tack för ditt tålamod och trevlig sommar!*
**Följ oss i sociala medier**

title: Enterprise Account Executive
description:
Are you an Enterprise Account Executive with a passion for gaming and innovative AI technology?
 



  





 If so, Motorica wants you on our team!
 



  





 We're making character animation in the gaming industry simpler with our generative AI technology.
 



  





**About Us:** 




 At Motorica, we've created a system that can automatically generate a perfect-coverage animation set for Motion Matching in a single click. No mocap. No cleanup. Just animation. Gone are the days of costly motion capture studios and endless post-processing. With a simple click, our technology generates lifelike movement, saving time and resources for game studios worldwide. Here's a glimpse of our journey so far:
 


* We're proud recipients of a MegaGrant from Epic Games, a testament to our innovation in the field.
* Our team includes top researchers in character animation, driving excellence in our product.
* Leading institutions like Meta and Berkeley trust our model for benchmarking state-of-the-art animation (see this
 
 link
 
 ).



  





**Your Role** 




 As an Enterprise Account Executive at Motorica, you'll play an important role in shaping the future of gaming animation. Your role will be to manage sales processes with AA and AAA gaming companies.
 



  





 We’re seeking individuals with:
 


* Experience selling services or products to AA and AAA gaming companies.
* Familiarity in the mocap and animation space.
* Strong commercial experience, from first meeting to negotiation.



  





 What We Offer:
 


* Access to cutting-edge AI research, driving continuous improvement and innovation.
* The chance to shape the commercial strategy of a technology with huge potential in the gaming industry.
* The chance to be there at the beginning of something great, and get opportunities to grow your career path with us as we scale.
* Enjoy a competitive salary.



  





*Don’t hesitate to apply, we will get back to you within 2 working days.*

title: Customer Success & Engineer Lead
description:
**About Validio**
 Validio provides the Data Trust Platform that stops unknown data issues from reaching your business. Our platform unifies Data Observability, Lineage, and Catalog—all into one interface which gives you full control over your data. If something breaks, Validio lets the right people know immediately and shows a direct path to resolution. Validio is used by world-leading companies including Truecaller, OfferFit, AB CarVal, and Voi.
   

  

 Too many companies struggle to see return on their data and AI investments, caused by bad data and a lack of prioritization among data assets. We believe that the key to successful data and AI initiatives is to prioritize, validate and improve the data that actually matters to the business. For data to be useful, it needs to be trusted—both by business users and data teams.
   

  

 Here, your colleagues consist of a senior team of data- and engineering professionals with diverse backgrounds from renowned research institutions, leading startups, and established tech companies. Named as one of the hottest start-ups in Stockholm by publications such as Wired, Validio is gearing up for expansion, and now you can be part of our journey!
   

  

**About The Role**
 Validio is on an exciting growth journey and this is a rare opportunity for someone to build and lead our Customer Success & Engineer function from the ground up, meaning ownership of customer satisfaction and success. At Validio we work on some of the most exciting modern data infrastructure architectures and our customers challenge us with interesting new data quality validation and monitoring requirements continuously. As the complexity grows for both us and our customers, we are looking to our Customer Success & Engineer Lead to strategize and lead customers to solutions. This is done by use case discovery, data asset prioritization, establishing Validio ways of working, and educating users about our product.
   

  

 As our Customer Success & Engineer Lead, you will manage our customer relationships, become a trusted technical advisor to our users, and contribute to Validio’s fast-growing success. You will be the voice of the user and collaborate closely with product and engineering to make sure key improvements are added to the roadmap. You must be able to capture and contextualize product feedback for our engineering and product teams, track issue resolutions, explain new feature enhancements, and mitigate/prioritize any pain points before they become critical issues. As the Customer Success & Engineer Lead you must be ready to work and have technical discussions with our customers, translating business requirements and map them into solutions that Validio’s platform can solve for. The goal is to help our customers to become successful and enthusiastic Validio champions.
   

  

**What You’ll Do**
* Oversee the ultimate success of our customers and users, ensuring they realize the full potential of the Validio platform; clearly communicating and assisting with use case deployments and different data requirements
* Responsible for the overall relationship with assigned customers, which will include onboarding, increasing adoption, ensuring retention, and building trust and advocacy with our customers
* Meet and exceed commercial renewal and expansion and grow customer usage
* Proactively engage customers to ensure all needs are met and to troubleshoot and prioritize accordingly any issues our bugs
* Be the voice of the customer & user and advocate for their needs & product feedback internally
* Support product marketing initiatives such as developing customer stories, case studies, and references
* In addition, you might take additional projects to help improve the product and set processes to reduce the support load and streamline ways of working
* Maintain best-in-class retention rate.
* Drive G2 reviews
* Drive product adoption
* Increase customer testimonials


**We believe you have**
* +3 years of experience in customer success / sales engineering / solutions engineering in a B2B Software/SaaS company (ideally a data-centric product). Alternatively experience from Management Consultancy with focus on technical projects.
* Experience in recruiting, building and leading stellar CS teams
* History of driving outsized growth and upsell within accounts
* Demonstrated success maximizing customer retention and minimizing churn
* Top-notch verbal & written communication skills and excellent in English
* Ability to listen empathize with the customer; you pick up non-verbal cues and understand the tone of the conversation and how to communicate the right message to each member of the audience
* Excellent project management skills and demonstrated success working cross-functionally to drive complex projects to fruition
* Comfortable with ambiguity, creative, and incredibly resourceful. We are a startup and it will require you to learn quickly while creating new processes
* Ability to learn and internalize new technical concepts, in order to answer customer questions
* Can clearly articulate technical requirements to business requirements, and the other way around
* Not afraid to roll up the sleeves and drive day to day work yourself, e.g. testing customer configurations and guiding customers to set-up Validio


**Extra Points If You Have**
* Experience in technical data role such as Data Engineering, Analytics Engineer, BI Analyst or similar or closely related data roles e.g. Data Engineer turned Customer Success
* Previous experience from early-stage startup of growth stage company


 At Validio we strive to be an inclusive and diverse workplace and believe that different experiences are necessary for our growth as a company. We understand that great talent can come from anywhere and we encourage all who are excited about building the next level data trust platform to apply - regardless of your experience in listed areas!
   

  

 Here you’ll find a hybrid working style, which for us means that you can choose if you want to come into our beautiful office or if you’d rather work remotely from home. We are all located in Sweden and we support your relocation here to join us if not here already! You can read more about our benefits on our career page and culture here. Lastly, we offer you the chance to be part of something truly amazing and with a world-class team, there is no limit to what we can achieve together.
   

  

 Would you like to learn more about your future colleagues? Here is a link to our post, where you can find shorter interviews with our employees.
