 Begin your journey with us by clicking "Apply" below.
   

  

 We can’t wait to meet you!

title: 13.Säkerhetsbataljon söker IT-Säkerhetschef
description:
* Säkerhetsbataljon är ett operativt försvarsmaktsgemensamt krigsförband med hög materiel och personell tillgänglighet som ska kunna verka i hela konfliktskalan. Bataljonens huvuduppgift är att upptäcka, klarlägga och motverka säkerhetshotande verksamhet i form av främmande underrättelseinhämtning, kriminalitet, terrorism, sabotage och subversion som riktas mot Försvarsmaktens prioriterade skyddsvärden.


 Bataljonen verkar preventivt genom säkerhetsunderrättelsetjänst och säkerhetsskyddshöjande åtgärder.
   

  

 Vår vision är att 13.Säkerhetsbataljon bryter motståndarens förnekelsebarhet, och skapar förutsättningar för hela Försvarsmakten att möta varje hot och klara varje utmaning.
   

  

 Vill du vara med och bidra till att öka säkerheten på 13.Säkerhetsbataljon genom att arbeta med säkerhetsskyddshöjande åtgärder?
   

  

**Nu söker vi en IT-säkerhetschef till Underrättelse och Säkerhetssektionen, S2.**
 Underrättelse och säkerhetssektionen vid 13.Säkerhetsbataljon leder, samordnar och utvecklar bataljonens underrättelse och säkerhetstjänst. Som IT-säkerhetschef tillhör du säkerhetsdetaljen på sektionen. Säkerhetsdetaljen ansvarar för 13.Säkerhetsbataljons interna säkerhetstjänst och stödjer chefer vid planering och genomförande av insatser. Befattningen innebär stora möjligheter att utveckla kompetens och erfarenhet inom säkerhetstjänst.
   

  

**Ditt uppdrag**
 Som IT-säkerhetschef hos oss kommer du arbeta på 13. Säkerhetsbataljons stab. Här kommer du planera och följa upp informationssäkerheten och IT-säkerheten inom bataljonen. Genomföra utbildning inom informations- och IT-säkerhet. Utvärdera och motverka de risker som finns kopplade till bataljonens IT-system och följa upp ackreditering av system med mera. Som IT-säkerhetschef hos oss och en del av säkerhetsdetaljen kommer du att kunna utveckla dig själv inom säkerhetstjänsten såväl som att få möjlighet att utbilda andra i säkerhetstjänst.
   

  

**Kvalifikationer**
* Erfarenhet från säkerhets- och/eller underrättelsetjänst
* Genomförd och godkänd specialistofficersutbildning
* B-körkort


**Meriterande**
* Genomförd internationell insats vid underrättelse/säkerhetsförband.
* Utbildning inom militär- och/eller civil säkerhetstjänst
* Tidigare tjänstgöring på militärpolis- eller säkerhetsförband
* Erfarenhet från internationell insats
* Säkerhetsutbildning via FMUNDSÄKC
* Genomförd ISUS utbildning
* God datorvana


**Dina egenskaper**
 Befattningen ställer krav på god samarbetsförmåga och social kompetens. Då arbetstempot ofta är högt förutsätter det att du har en hög stresstålighet och uthållighet. Arbetet innebär hantering av sekretessklassificerad information vilket ställer krav på att du är ansvarstagande och har hög personlig integritet. Du är initiativtagande och engagerad med god förmåga att självständigt planera och lösa uppgifter som kan sträcka sig över tid. Stor vikt kommer att läggas vid personlig lämplighet.
   

  

**Utbildningar**
 Inom försvarsmakten finns det mycket goda möjligheter till kompetensutveckling. Detta gäller även inom området IT-säkerhet där det finns flera kurser som specifikt riktar sig mot IT-säkerhetschefer i försvarsmakten. Utbildningar tillhandahålls efter behov.
   

  

*För att myndighetens uppdrag ska vara framgångsrikt förutsätts att alla medarbetare uppträder enligt den värdegrund som finns. Försvarsmaktens värdegrund slår vakt om alla människors lika värde, rättsvisa och jämlikhet och främjar demokrati och mänskliga rättigheter (läs mer på* 
*www.forsvarsmakten.se* 
*).*
**Övrigt**
 Anställningsform:Tillsvidareanställning som inleds med 6 månaders provanställning
   

  

 Sysselsättningsgrad: Heltid
   

  

 Arbetsort Kungsängen
   

  

 Tillträdesdatum: Enligt överenskommelse
   

  

**Upplysningar om befattningen**
 LG-13sakbat-s2sak@mil.se
   

  

 Märk mailet ”Rekrytering IT-säkerhetschef S2-säk”.
   

  

**Information om rekryteringsprocessen:**
 Personalgeneralist Chris Flygare, LG-13sakbat-rekrytering@mil.se
   

  

**Fackliga företrädare**
 Kenneth Hartikainen OFR/S
   

  

 Orry Finnermark OFR/O
   

  

 Johan Gillemyr SACO
   

  

 Lise-Lott Larsson SEKO
   

  

 Samtliga nås via: 08-584 540 00
   

  

 Välkommen med din ansökan
 *senast 2024-07-12.* 
 Din ansökan bör innehålla CV samt ansökningsbrev där du motiverar varför du är lämpad för denna befattning.
   

  

**Ansökningar till denna befattning kommer endast tas emot via Försvarsmaktens webbplats.** 
 -------------------------------------------------------- Information om Försvarsmakten och det rekryterande förbandet: Livgardet är ett av Försvarsmaktens största förband med anor från 1521. Vi utbildar morgondagens soldater, liksom militärpoliser och personal som ska genomföra internationell insats. Vi bevakar de kungliga slotten, vi har säkerhets- och markstridsförband. Vi ansvarar också för att bevara och utveckla svensk militärmusiktradition. Vårt huvudsäte är i Kungsängen utanför Stockholm, men vi finns också i Sollentuna, i centrala Stockholm, Uppsala, Göteborg och Karlskrona. Inom Försvarsmakten finns en stark värdegrund som bygger på öppenhet, resultat och ansvar. Professionell utveckling och personlig hälsa värdesätts och uppmuntras. Det finns goda förutsättningar för intern karriärrörlighet, friskvård samt bra balans mellan arbete och privatliv. En anställning hos oss innebär placering i säkerhetsklass. Vanligtvis krävs svenskt medborgarskap. Säkerhetsprövning med registerkontroll kommer att genomföras före anställning enligt 3 kap i säkerhetsskyddslagen. Med anställning följer en skyldighet att krigsplaceras. I anställningen ingår även en skyldighet att tjänstgöra utomlands. Innebörden av detta varierar beroende på typ av befattning. Till ansökan om anställning ska CV och personligt brev bifogas. Om du går vidare i anställningsprocessen ska alltid vidimerade kopior av betyg och intyg uppvisas. Samtal från externa rekryteringsföretag och säljare undanbedes.

title: Product Owner to Enterprise Business Analytics
description:
Are you ready to step into a role that goes beyond the ordinary? Do you see yourself as a visionary leader who not only realizes business needs but also supports individuals on their self-help journey? Join us as a Product Owner in Enterprise Business Analytics, NCC’s Central solution for Business Intelligence and Advanced Analytics. At our core, we believe in empowerment, collaboration, and fostering an environment where every voice is heard. Embrace the challenge of change management and be a part of something bigger!
   

  

**Your Role And Key Responsibilities**
 As our Business Analytics Product Owner, you'll be the driving force behind the success of our service consumer/business relationships, product development, delivery, and operations. Your influence extends to product lifecycle management and managing service providers. But here's the twist – we're not just about hard skills, we're about lifting each other through empowerment activities.
   

  

**Your Journey With Us**
* Translate and Transform: You'll be the key liaison for stakeholders, expertly translating their demands into a prioritized product backlog. Your role is to make impactful decisions on execution and foster a collaborative environment within the team.
* Problem-Solving Pro: Your role goes beyond the expected. We value problem-solving skills as a key asset in driving innovation and overcoming challenges. Be the go-to person for turning roadblocks into steppingstones.
* Beyond Boundaries: Your role extends beyond the product team. Partner with the IT Service Owner to ensure compliance with IT standards and fulfill our strategic roadmap. Your purpose is crystal clear – maximize the value of the delivered product for the business.


**Your Experience And Background**
* Empowered Education: An academic degree in IT is a plus, but what sets you apart is your passion for empowerment activities.
* Experience that Speaks: You have several years of experience in Business Analytics, hands-on experience in developing solutions, and a knack for stakeholder management. Your leadership skills are excellent, making you a perfect fit for our team.
* Language of Connection: Fluent in English and one of the Nordic languages – communication is your superpower.
* Problem-Solving Guru: We value individuals who thrive in solving challenges. Your ability to approach problems with creativity and strategic thinking is a crucial asset.
* Tech Savvy: Familiarity with Microsoft products, such as Power BI and Azure, is a bonus. But what matters most is your curiosity about new ideas and your receptiveness to change.


 You will join the Group function “Finance & IT”, which leads NCC´s strategic development and major change programs in the business. Finance & IT is NCC’s development and delivery function for IT as well as operations development and research & innovation. We are a Nordic organization with 150+ employees working together closely under one common management. Cooperation in- and between units is key for us to deliver value to NCC’s business areas, and therefore we are currently transforming to an Agile mindset and way of working in Agile teams.
   

  

**Additional Information**
 This position can be in any of our major cities in Sweden, Denmark and Norway. The position may require travelling 1-2 days a month within the Nordic countries, although we do apply a flexible way of working and strive to collaborate digitally as much as possible.
   

  

 In accordance with NCC’s safety culture we conduct background checks on final candidates.You will be reporting to the IT Competence Manager.
   

  

**Contact and application**
 Please register your application and CV in English below. Selection is ongoing, so please apply no later than August 16, 2024. For further information on this position, please contact Lis Karlehem, IT Competence Manager, +46706276580 or Karin Österman de Wall, HR Recruitment Specialist, +46790787210.
   

  

 Welcome with your application!
   

  

**NCC offers**
 NCCstrives to be anappealing employer, providing a work environment where employees cangrow and experience well-being. We offer a wide range of employee benefits and NCC has collective agreements for all employees, providing a solid foundation of security and clear guidelines so that you know what applies to your employment. We also offer excellent opportunities for continued development and a broad range of further education options, allowing for a long career within the company.
   

  

**Build with us - together with the best colleagues in the industry!**
 At NCC, we are driven to continue developing, whether it's our construction projects or our personal expertise. Every day, we drive the industry's most exciting and complex construction projects forward in close cooperation between our employees, partners and customers.
   

  

 With us, you are a significant employee who contributes to the landmarks that define our cities and communities. Here, our employees take an active role in a corporate culture based on stable values and behaviors for a safe and secure workplace. Our collective expertise and diverse backgrounds make a difference.
   

  

 NCC - one of the leading construction companies in the Nordics.
   

  

 About NCC: NCC Corporate Movie
   

  

*We kindly but firmly decline contact with recruiters and sellers of advertising or staffing solutions.*

title: Microsoft 365 Specialist, Enterprise Applications
description:
Nexer Worklife specializes in Microsoft 365 and SharePoint solutions. We seek a Microsoft 365 Specialist to help our customers maximize their potential with Microsoft 365. Join our growing team and apply today!
   

  

 We always strive to deliver business and customer value by combining technical development and strategy with a focus on the end user. We take responsibility for the entire digital workplace from initial research, analysis and planning to development, launch, change management and support. Our team is spread out in several locations, and we are now looking to grow with a new colleague!
   

  

 At Nexer we value work-life balance, hence you can influence your work and everyday life. Our assignments vary in length and content, and you have the opportunity to work either on short- or long-term assignments.
   

  

**What does the role look lik** 
**e?**
 As a Microsoft 365 Specialist you'll help our customers increase their business value by using Microsoft 365. With a user-centric approach, you will support and simplify the daily work of individuals, strengthen collaboration between different teams and increase productivity in the organization. The work takes place within the framework of the customer's business and communication processes, which therefore requires good knowledge of Microsoft 365, digital workplace trends, understanding of business processes, training and change management, as well as a commitment to understanding how the business can be supported by digital tools.
   

  

**I** 
**n this role you will:**
* Support customers with Microsoft 365 apps such as Microsoft Teams, SharePoint or Microsoft 365 Copilot
* Identify and analyze existing ways of working, future needs and goals in close dialogue with the customer
* Map, analyze and create strategies and plans for the organization's digital workplace. Examples could be: Implementation plans, information architecture, document management, security or governance
* Create an understanding of Microsoft 365 and how the tools can be used to facilitate the daily work (for instance with workshops, training sessions, etc.)
* Assist customers with, for example, governance and migration activities
* Manage projects related to the digital workplace
* Assume the role of a solution architect (solutions may vary depending on your profile)
* Help drive change in the organization


**Your** 
**background**
 You are passionate about digital workplace solutions and have strategic as well as practical knowledge of how to implement solutions based on these technologies successfully in organizations. You have experience of working with the products in Microsoft 365 and preferably also knowledge of Microsoft infrastructure such as Exchange, Entra ID, Intune. As a person, you should have a great interest in supporting businesses with both digital tools, roadmap planning and acting as an advisor. You have excellent communication skills and enjoy working with change. You are well versed in leading projects, both in Swedish and English, and can create plans and strategies that help our customers achieve their goals.
   

  

**More About Us**
 Nexer Worklife is a business unit within Nexer specialized in Microsoft 365. By focusing on people and technology and combining it with change management and communications we can support our customers on every step of their digital workplace journey. We have a family culture with great team spirit and close and transparent leadership.
   

  

 You can read more about us here: https://nexergroup.com/careerhub/come-on-in-nexer-ea/
   

  

  

  

**Our** 
**culture**
 Nexer’s vision is Promising future – it is important to us to make a difference and contribute to a better future. We embrace diversity and inclusion and believe that people from different backgrounds make our work and company better. We also contribute to a better society for example via Star for Life, Mitt Liv and Pink Programming. We also have fun at work! This means joint events, trips, team activities and conferences both within our business area and with the whole Nexer Group.
   

  

**Application**
 You are welcome to send your application to us using the link below. We have unfortunately no opportunity to receive applications via email, but if you have any questions about the position or Nexer you can contact Maja Åström, Maja.Astrom@nexergroup.com. We continuously handle the applications as they arrive.

title: Senior Data & AI Platform Architect
description:
**Solve complex problems. Decode the future.**
 At Electrolux Group, as a leading global appliance company, we strive every day to shape living for the better for our consumers, our people and our planet. We share ideas and collaborate so that together, we can develop solutions that deliver enjoyable and sustainable living.
   

  

 Come join us as you are. We believe diverse perspectives make us stronger and more innovative. In our global community of people from 100+ countries, we listen to each other, actively contribute, and grow together.
   

  

 Join us in our exciting quest to build the future home.
   

  

**All about the role:**
 The Data Platform Team at Electrolux is dedicated to empowering data-driven decision-making and innovation with a robust, scalable and secure data platform built on Azure using data mesh architecture. Our team designs and implements data mesh architecture that promotes autonomy and agility across the organization. We work closely with cross-functional teams including data scientists, product architects and data engineers to understand requirements, iterate solutions and deliver value-driven outcomes. We implement best practices for data governance, access control and compliance, leveraging latest tools and industry standards.
   

  

 As a Senior Data & AI Platform Architect, you will design, develop, implement and support the Global Data and AI platform based in Azure. Key tasks include working with Cloud infrastructure, Enterprise Architecture, Data Engineering and Data science teams in deploying solutions. The work contains multidisciplinary technologies such as Infrastructure as Code (IaC), Continuous Integration and Continuous Delivery (CI/CD), and containerization. Together with Data compliance and Domain teams, you will ensure that data is managed and consumed in accordance with Electrolux security and compliance policies
   

  

**What you'll do:**
* Design and implement scalable, secure and high availability applications on Microsoft Azure utilizing components such as Azure Databricks, Azure Data Lake Storage, Azure Data Factory, Event Hubs, Kubernetes clusters etc.
* Build platform strategies aligned with business objectives.
* Architect and maintain CI/CD process, pipelines and scripts.
* Provide technical leadership and guidance to Platform, Product and Engineering teams
* Lead platform related project initiatives
* Proactively monitor and manage resources and services to ensure optimal performance and cost efficiency.
* Proactively work to prevent Data exfiltration i.e., prevent data theft, data extrusion, data exportation, and data leakage
* Develop and maintain documentation of processes and tools related to the data platform
* Keep abreast of emerging technology trends and proactively look for opportunities to improve the Data & AI platform
* Assist Platform operations team in troubleshooting issues, deploying new tools and technologies.


**Qualifications** 
**:**
* Bachelor’s degree in computer science, IT or related field with at least 5 years of relevant experience.
* Fluent in English with excellent verbal and written communication skills
* Ability to work well in a fast-paced environment, strong work ethic, pragmatic, attention to detail and excellent interpersonal skills to interact with technical and non-technical users
* Experience with Policy based access controls, Azure Databricks, Storage, Data Factory, Airflow, Event hubs is required
* Experience in designing and building containerized applications using Docker, Kubernetes or similar is preferred
* Proven experience in using Infrastructure as Code (Terraform, Azure BICEP or similar), writing CI/CD pipelines (Azure DevOps or similar) and code source control (Git)
* Solid understanding of network concepts including VNET, subnet, NSG, VPN, ExpressRoute, and firewall.
* Microsoft Certifications like Azure Solutions Architect Expert is a plus


**Where you'll be:**
 You will be based at Electrolux office in Stockholm, Sweden.
   

  

**Benefit highlights include:**
* Flexible work hours/hybrid work environment.
* Attractive social benefits package.
* Extensive learning opportunities and flexible career path.


 We look forward to receiving you application!
   

  

 As part of Electrolux, we will continuously invest in you and your development. There are no barriers to where your career could take you.
   

  

**Find out more:**
 Electrolux Group

title: Swedish Sales Development Representative
description:
***This inclusive employer is a member of myGwork – the largest global platform for the LGBTQ+ business community.***
**Swedish Sales Development Representative - Solna Office**
 Oracle is a technology leader that’s changing how the world does business. Kick-start your future in a customer-centric role that gives you real responsibility, access to industry-leading experts, and an incredible learning experience. We want you to develop new business opportunities in the Swedish market, working from our Solna Office. Helps us create the future.
   

  

**Why work at Oracle**
* A competitive salary with exciting benefits
* Flexible and remote working to suit your needs
* Health insurance and pension contributions
* Annual leave of 30 days with the option to buy more
* Mentorship and training programs to advance your career
* Annual education budget to spend on career development
* Subsidized on site canteen for employees
* Employee resource groups that champion our diverse communities
* An Employee Assistance Program to support your mental health
* An inclusive culture that celebrates what makes you unique
* Family benefits such as parental leave, childcare support, and fertility and adoption programs


****What You’ll Do****
 Match customers’ business challenges to Oracle solutions, working with sales and marketing to develop campaigns that grow our business. You’ll engage new and existing customers by phone, email, and social selling.
   

  

* Identify sales opportunities in new and existing accounts
* Use online apps to understand and connect with your clients
* Make calls to customers and prospects
* Set up customer meetings and create sales pipeline
* Develop communication and social selling skills
* Analyze data to improve customer outreach
* Work to meet and exceed quarterly objectives
* Be curious, organized, and ready to grow
* Fluent Swedish + English essential.


*At Oracle, we don’t just respect differences — we celebrate them. We believe that innovation starts with inclusion, and that to create the future, we need people with diverse backgrounds, perspectives, and abilities. That’s why we’re committed to creating a workplace where all kinds of people can do their best work. It’s when everyone’s voice is heard and valued that we’re inspired to go beyond what’s been done before.*
*https://www.oracle.com/corporate/careers/diversity-inclusion/*
 Career Level - IC1
   

  

**Swedish Sales Development Representative - Solna Office**
 Oracle is a technology leader that’s changing how the world does business. Kick-start your future in a customer-centric role that gives you real responsibility, access to industry-leading experts, and an incredible learning experience. We want you to develop new business opportunities in the Swedish market, working from our Solna Office. Helps us create the future.
   

  

**Why work at Oracle**
* A competitive salary with exciting benefits
* Flexible and remote working to suit your needs
* Health insurance and pension contributions
* Annual leave of 30 days with the option to buy more
* Mentorship and training programs to advance your career
* Annual education budget to spend on career development
* Subsidized on site canteen for employees
* Employee resource groups that champion our diverse communities
* An Employee Assistance Program to support your mental health
* An inclusive culture that celebrates what makes you unique
* Family benefits such as parental leave, childcare support, and fertility and adoption programs


****What You’ll Do****
 Match customers’ business challenges to Oracle solutions, working with sales and marketing to develop campaigns that grow our business. You’ll engage new and existing customers by phone, email, and social selling.
   

  

* Identify sales opportunities in new and existing accounts
* Use online apps to understand and connect with your clients
* Make calls to customers and prospects
* Set up customer meetings and create sales pipeline
* Develop communication and social selling skills
* Analyze data to improve customer outreach
* Work to meet and exceed quarterly objectives
* Be curious, organized, and ready to grow
* Fluent Swedish + English essential.


*At Oracle, we don’t just respect differences — we celebrate them. We believe that innovation starts with inclusion, and that to create the future, we need people with diverse backgrounds, perspectives, and abilities. That’s why we’re committed to creating a workplace where all kinds of people can do their best work. It’s when everyone’s voice is heard and valued that we’re inspired to go beyond what’s been done before.*
*https://www.oracle.com/corporate/careers/diversity-inclusion/*
 As a world leader in cloud solutions, Oracle uses tomorrow’s technology to tackle today’s problems. True innovation starts with diverse perspectives and various abilities and backgrounds.
   

  

 When everyone’s voice is heard, we’re inspired to go beyond what’s been done before. It’s why we’re committed to expanding our inclusive workforce that promotes diverse insights and perspectives.
   

  

 We’ve partnered with industry-leaders in almost every sector—and continue to thrive after 40+ years of change by operating with integrity.
   

  

 Oracle careers open the door to global opportunities where work-life balance flourishes. We offer a highly competitive suite of employee benefits designed on the principles of parity and consistency. We put our people first with flexible medical, life insurance and retirement options. We also encourage employees to give back to their communities through our volunteer programs.
   

  

 We’re committed to including people with disabilities at all stages of the employment process. If you require accessibility assistance or accommodation for a disability at any point, let us know by calling +1 888 404 2494, option one.
   

  

****Disclaimer:****
 Oracle is an Equal Employment Opportunity Employer\*. All qualified applicants will receive consideration for employment without regard to race, color, religion, sex, national origin, sexual orientation, gender identity, disability and protected veterans’ status, or any other characteristic protected by law. Oracle will consider for employment qualified applicants with arrest and conviction records pursuant to applicable law.
   

  

* Which includes being a United States Affirmative Action Employer

title: Frilansande fullstackutvecklare hos We Know IT - Öppen ansökan
description:
**Om rollen 💡**
 Vi på We Know IT söker alltid duktiga IT-profiler, just nu är vi ute efter mer erfarna fullstackutvecklare för kommande frilansuppdrag. I denna roll kommer du att vara en viktig del av vårt team och arbeta med en varierad portfölj av projekt inom app- (mobil & webb) och systemutveckling för våra företagskunder. Du kommer att samarbeta tätt med projektledare, designers och andra utvecklare för att säkerställa leveranser av hög kvalitet. Hos oss får du möjlighet att specialisera dig inom ditt favoritprogrammeringsspråk och ramverk, samt att bredda din tekniska kompetens.
   

  

 Vi söker dig som har en stark teknisk bakgrund och en passion för utveckling. Du har ett gediget intresse för att hålla dig uppdaterad med de senaste teknologier och trivs i en dynamisk arbetsmiljö. Du är kommunikativ och har förmågan att samarbeta effektivt i team, samtidigt som du kan ta eget ansvar för dina arbetsuppgifter.
   

  

**Krav 🤙**
* Minst 3 års erfarenhet inom fullstackprogrammering.
* Gedigen arbetslivserfarenhet som utvecklare.
* Djupgående kunskaper inom fullstackutveckling och språk/ramverk .NET, C#, JavaScript, Flutter, React.js, Node.js osv.
* Relevant akademisk utbildning, helst MSc/BSc.
* Förmåga att omvandla användar- och kundkrav till tekniska lösningar.
* Mycket goda kunskaper i svenska och engelska, både tal och skrift.


**Meriterande 🎖️**
* Erfarenhet som tech lead eller projektledning.
* Kunskaper inom Google Cloud Platform, AWS eller liknande cloudlösningar.
* Erfarenhet från startup eller scaleup-bolag.
* Erfarenhet av agila arbetsprocesser.


**Om oss 🚀**
 We Know IT är en innovativ digital byrå grundad 2008, specialiserad på webb- och apputveckling, UX/UI-design, digital marknadsföring, hosting och förvaltning. Med över 1000 framgångsrika projekt kombinerar vi senior kompetens med unga IT-talanger från Sveriges främsta universitet. We Know IT erbjuder innovativa, prisvärda lösningar och långsiktiga samarbeten, och har arbetat med kunder från startups till börsnoterade företag.
   

  

**Ansökan**
 OBS! Ditt CV kan komma att delas med våra samarbetspartners för att matcha med potentiella uppdrag. Genom att ansöka till rollen godkänner du att vi får dela ditt CV.
   

  

**For more information or questions please contact us at** 
 hr@weknowit.se

title: Software Security Engineer
description:
**Utveckla framtiden med oss** 




 Omegapoint är ett ledande cybersäkerhetsföretag som arbetar med säker digitalisering. Vi utvecklar och förvaltar säkra system och lösningar för våra kunder. Våra konsulter arbetar med allt från infrastruktur, DevOps och DevSecOps till avancerad systemutveckling – där säkerhet och assurans genomsyrar allt. Nu utökar vi vårt team med fler Software Security Engineers.
 



  





**Att jobba som Software Security Engineer på Omegapoint kan innebära att du:** 



* hjälper utvecklingsteam eller utvecklare med det mesta relaterat till applikationssäkerhet
* sätter upp användning av säkerhetsverktyg i pipelines
* förklarar findings i säkerhetsverktyg (kanske kopplat till OWASP Top 10)
* hjälper till med att genomföra hotmodelleringar
* granskar säkerheten i applikationer eller molnmiljöer
* hjälper till att utveckla eller skripta mindre komponenter



  





 För att trivas tror vi att du är utåtriktad, drivande och kvalitetsmedveten. Det är viktigt att du har en stark vilja att utvecklas och håller dig uppdaterad om de senaste teknikerna och idéerna inom domänen.
 



  





 Vi ser även att du är en stolt utvecklare som alltid strävar efter att skapa värde åt våra kunder. Vidare är du prestigelös och delar gärna med dig av din erfarenhet och kompetens både internt och externt.
 



  





**För att lyckas i rollen tror vi att du brinner du för kombinationen av utveckling och säkerhet** 



* Skulle du även kunna förklara OWASP Top 10 för en utvecklare?
* Vill du vara en mentor eller utbilda utvecklare som behöver förstå och hantera säkerhet?
* Kan du exempelvis Java, JavaScript/TypeScript, C# eller Python?
* Har du dessutom 3-5 års arbetslivserfarenhet, alternativt en gedigen utbildning, inom systemutveckling och säkerhet?



***Varmt välkommen med din ansökan ⤵️***




  





**Om oss** 




 Omegapoint är Norra Europas ledande konsultbolag inom cybersäker digitalisering. Med en vision om en framtid där vi fullt ut kan lita på teknik använder vi vår expertis för att säkra våra kunders och medarbetares utveckling. Vi är vassa och snälla, något som karaktäriseras av vår kompetensutvecklingskultur och viljan att dela vår kunskap med varandra. Vi är för närvarande över 900 anställda konsulter i Stockholm, Oslo, Drammen, Köpenhamn, Göteborg, Malmö, Örebro, Västerås, Enköping, Uppsala och Umeå. Företaget grundades 2001, ägs delvis av medarbetare, delvis av FSN Capital.
 



  





**Vi satsar på dig** 




 På Omegapoint sätter vi din kompetens i centrum och ger dig alla förutsättningar för ett utvecklande och varierat jobb. Som konsult hos oss tillbringar du vardagen i uppdrag hos någon av våra kunder, men har alltid en välkomnande hemmahamn på kontoret i centrala Stockholm. Här ordnar vi mängder av aktiviteter under året för att vi ska utvecklas och ligga i framkant. Det är en del i vår kompetenskultur som bygger på samarbete och en vilja att stärka varandra.
 



  





 Med en stor och varierande kundbas, från små specialistföretag till stora och välkända företag och myndigheter, har vi en möjlighet att erbjuda utmanande och roliga uppdrag.
 



  





 Givetvis erbjuder vi även allt det andra som är viktigt, som marknadsmässiga löner, förstärkt föräldralön, anpassade förmånspaket, friskvårdsbidrag, sjukvårdsförsäkring och möjlighet till delägarskap.
 



  





 Vi vågar lova dig en arbetsplats där du kommer att trivas, utvecklas och ges alla möjligheter till en ljus framtid.

title: Product Manager - OT
description:
**Orange Cyberdefense, an Orange Group company, is one of the world's leading cyber security services and solutions providers.** 




  





 Lead and develop the OT Service segment, managing a key part of our Global Product Portfolio. Your role is crucial in shaping the OT Product vision, driving product innovation, and achieving customer satisfaction.
 



  





 Reporting to the Director of Product Management (Managed Cloud, Network and Workspace Services), you will collaborate with the wider Product team, Innovation, Marketing, Global Operations, Sales & Presales, and other key stakeholders to craft product strategies, seize market opportunities, and develop your product roadmap in line with Global Product Management. Your role will be pivotal in setting the vision and mission for your product and service, driving product innovation, and ensuring high customer satisfaction.
 



  





**Key Responsibilities:** 



* Develop and Innovate: Create and enhance global OT cybersecurity managed services, aiming for EBITDA and revenue growth.
* Product Lifecycle Management: Oversee the entire product lifecycle from introduction to operational delivery. Ensure alignment with both internal and external customer needs, manage operational delivery requirements, and maintain a focus on continuous improvement and product evolution, and continuously update the roadmap for OT Managed Security Services.
* Product Management Framework: Actively seek out and utilize product management frameworks such as Agile, MVPs, and OKRs (setting clear objectives) for structured and efficient processes.
* Managed Security Services Strategy: Lead, define, and drive the strategy, value proposition, and Go-To-Market for Orange Cyberdefense OT Managed Security Services such as Vulnerability Management, Network Security Monitoring, and Firewall.
* Market Monitoring and Strategy: Continuously monitor the OT security market to identify trends and opportunities. Enhance customer experiences, accelerate time to market, and manage customer expectations
* OT Security Strategy: Contribute to the end-to-end OT Security strategy, value proposition, and GTM (Go-To-Market) of Orange Cyberdefense in close collaboration with professional services, Orange Business, and partners.
* Cross-functional Leadership: Lead cross-functional teams responsible for the development and delivery of OT Managed Security Services to drive continuous improvement.
* Sales Enablement: Lead the enablement of Orange Cyberdefense Sales and Pre-Sales teams on OT Managed Security Services.
* Profitability Management: Lead and continuously improve the profitability of OT Managed Security Services.
* Sales and Contractual Collateral: Own the sales and contractual collateral for OT Managed Security Services.
* Stakeholder Orchestration: Orchestrate complex initiatives with various stakeholders across Orange Cyberdefense and Orange Business.
* Product Management Representation: Represent the Orange Cyberdefense OT Managed Security Services to Orange Cyberdefense, Orange Business, and external stakeholders.



  





**What we expect of you** 



* Minimum of 5 years of experience in Product Management, preferably in the cybersecurity industry.
* Demonstrated experience in successfully launching and managing global products.
* Must be a team player, capable of managing people, setting objectives, and leading with a product management mindset.
* Strong business acumen with a proven ability to drive revenue and profit growth through effective product positioning and go-to-market strategies.
* Broad understanding across multiple areas of cybersecurity, including OT, cloud, application architecture, Identity and Access Management, network security, endpoint security, and advanced SOC deliveries.
* Skills in cybersecurity regulations and standards.
* Strong focus on Customer Experience to ensuring smooth customer journey, product usability and customer satisfaction.

title: SAP Konsulter
description:
**Var dig själv**
**Forma framtiden**
 Är du redo att ta din kompetens till nästa nivå?
   

  

 Vi expanderar och letar efter dig som vill vara en del av vårt team.
   

  

 På Accenture är ingen dag är den andra lik och det är precis därför vi trivs här! Detta är en fantastisk möjlighet att bygga en spännande karriär inom Accentures affärsområde för SAP. Med oss får du arbeta i ett avslappnat och drivet team med talangfulla kollegor. Vi hjälps åt för nå våra mål i en grupp där alla kan vara sig själva. Här får du arbeta med kundprojekt i några av världens ledande organisationer och företag.
   

  

**Accentures svenska SAP-affärsområde**
 Som marknadsledande affärspartner sedan över 40 år tillbaka arbetar vi med SAP end-to-end, från produktinnovation till utveckling och leverans. Vi driver flera stora SAP-transformationsprojekt med några av de största företagen. Inom vårt nordiska SAP-community arbetar vi med de senaste SAP-lösningarna och tjänsterna såsom SAP S/4 HANA Cloud, SAP CX, Ariba, SuccessFactors, SAP BTP och SAP RISE.
   

  

 Accenture är inte bara ledande inom teknologi utan också inom funktionell expertis. Om du har erfarenhet inom finans, supply chain, inköp eller HR kommer du att hitta andra kollegor att utvecklas tillsammans med. Erfarenhet inom Data and Analytics är ytterligare en nyckelkompetens vi letar efter.
   

  

 Vi har ett starkt hållbarhetsfokus. Vi hjälper kunder att definiera och möjliggöra hållbarhetsstrategier – till exempel minska koldioxidavtryck eller mängden avfall – och samtidigt skapa affärsvärde för kunden.
   

  

 För att läsa mer om vår SAP-verksamhet, besök oss på https://www.accenture.com/se-en/services/sap-index.
   

  

**Hos oss får du**
- Arbeta med några av våra största SAP-kunder med stora implementerings- och förändringsprojekt.

- Betydande karriär- och utvecklingsmöjligheter med en dedikerad mentor som vägleder och coachar dig

- Bli en del av vår gemenskap och företagskultur baserad på vår värdegrund

- Möjlighet att utveckla din expertis, bredda dina konsultverktyg och få tekniska och professionella färdigheter.

- Tillgång till vår globala organisations omfattande verktyg, såsom databaser, expertnätverk och benchmarking.

- Utveckla och dra nytta av din kompetens inom SAP-lösningar genom att analysera, utforma och implementera affärsprocesser

**Kvalifikationer som krävs**
- Minst 2 års praktisk erfarenhet av SAP.

- Du står bakom och värnar om Accentures värderingar.

- Vara anpassningsbar och trivas i en teamorienterad miljö.

- Passionerad inom SAP och innovation, och drivas av att leverera de senaste teknologierna till våra kunder.

- Ha starka analytiska kunskaper, vara resultatinriktad och ha en god känsla av ansvar, flexibilitet och struktur.

- Utmärkta kommunikations- och presentationsfärdigheter i både svenska och engelska (i tal och skrift), för att kommunicera med tekniska och icke-tekniska målgrupper på ett lättillgängligt sätt.

- Stark vilja att ta sig an problem och föreslå möjliga lösningar i samarbete med andra teammedlemmar

- Inneha en kandidat- eller masterexamen.

 Vi söker nya talanger till positioner på olika nivåer. För ledarroller vill vi att du har minst 7 års relevant projekterfarenhet samt har lett ett team, och gärna också varit involverad i försäljning av nya projekt.
   

  

**Meriterande kvalifikationer**
- Erfarenhet av minst en S/4HANA-implementering, antingen SAP Greenfield eller Brownfield.

- Erfarenhet inom S/4HANA-området, till exempel inom funktionella områden som logistik, inköp, finans, arkivering eller security.

- Djup affärs- och branscherfarenhet inom en eller flera branscher.

- Grundläggande kunskaper om FIORI och SAP UI5 är en fördel.

- SAP-certifiering inom relevant område eller vilja att bli certifierad

**Plats**
 Stockholm, Göteborg, Malmö

title: Account Executive, New Business
description:
*Modular Finance levererar verktyg till aktörer inom finansbranschen med syfte att skapa effektivitet och transparens på kapitalmarknaden. Vi står inför en spännande expansion vidare i Norden och UK, och söker därför fler stjärnor till vårt kund- och säljteam!* 




  





**Om oss** 




 Vi är ett stabilt, snabbväxande och entreprenöriellt SaaS-bolag inom finans med drygt 60 anställda. Det innebär ett högt tempo, mycket ansvar från start och stor frihet att forma sin egen roll och utveckling. Vi motiveras av att leverera bästa service till våra kunder, frihet att ta egna initiativ och att jobba i en miljö där mycket händer!
 



  





**Om tjänsten** 




 Som Account Executive, New Business kommer du att arbeta med försäljning primärt mot helt nya kunder, men det ingår även försäljning av nya avtal till befintliga kunder. I den här rollen kommer du dagligen att interagera med VDar, CFO:s och IR-chefer i börsnoterade bolag.
 



  





 Dina huvudsakliga arbetsuppgifter:
 



  




* Ansvara för hela säljprocessen - från prospektering och kontakt, till möten, förhandling och att stänga affären
* Etablera starka och långsiktiga relationer med beslutsfattare i börsnoterade bolag
* Driva interna och externa projekt, självständigt och tillsammans med andra



  





**För att lyckas i denna roll behöver du ha:** 



* 3-6 års erfarenhet av en kundnära roll som till exempel Account Executive, Managementkonsult, kundansvarig eller liknande
* Erfarenhet av kvalitativ B2B-försäljning
* Intresse för börsen och näringslivet
* Utmärkta kunskaper i svenska, tal och skrift
* Goda kunskaper i engelska, tal och skrift



  





**Det är meriterande om du:** 



* Tidigare har arbetat i finansbranschen
* Tidigare har arbetat inom SaaS-bolag i en kundnära roll
* Högre utbildning inom ekonomi eller finans
* Talar ett andra nordiskt språk



  





 För att vara framgångsrik i den här rollen behöver du vara börsintresserad och motiverad att jobba med försäljning. Du kommer ha stor frihet att lägga upp dina dagar, så du behöver ha förmåga att arbeta strukturerat och disciplinerat. Du behöver vara en god kommunikatör i både tal och skrift. Vi värdesätter kollegor som är prestigelösa och vill samarbeta för att nå sina egna och bolagets mål.
 



  





**Vad vi erbjuder** 



* En arbetsplats som främjar lärande och kunskapsspridning inom vårt område
* Vi växer snabbt och för rätt person finns goda möjligheter till spännande utveckling inom bolaget
* Stark teamkänsla och gemensamma bolagsaktiviteter såsom månatliga AW:s och större event
* Ett stabilt bolag med konkurrenskraftig lön, tjänstepension, friskvårdsbidrag, sjukförsäkring och vårdförsäkring
* Delägande i Modular Finance efter avslutad provanställning



  





**Anställningsform:** 
 Tillsvidareanställning med inledande provanställning om 6 månader
 



  





**Startdatum:** 
 Så snart som möjligt
 



  





**Placering:** 
 Stockholm. Vi tillämpar en hybridmodell med 8 valfria remotedagar i månaden.
 



  





**Välkommen att ansöka!** 




 Urvalet kommer att ske löpande, så vänta inte med din ansökan. Vid frågor kring tjänsten är du varmt välkommen att kontakta Jenny Borg, Head of Operations, på
 **jenny.borg@modularfinance.se** 
 .
 



  





 Vi kommer att svara på alla ansökningar.

title: Senior Engineering Manager (Bangkok based, relocation provided)
description:
**About Agoda**
 Agoda is an online travel booking platform for accommodations, flights, and more. We build and deploy cutting-edge technology that connects travelers with more than 3.6 million accommodations globally. Based in Asia and part of Booking Holdings, our 6,000+ employees representing 90+ nationalities foster a work environment rich in diversity, creativity, and collaboration. We innovate through a culture of experimentation and ownership, enhancing the ability for our customers to experience the world.
   

  

**Our Purpose –** 
**Bridging the World Through Travel**
 We believe travel allows people to enjoy, learn and experience more of the amazing world we live in. It brings individuals and cultures closer together, fostering empathy, understanding and happiness.
   

  

 We are a skillful, driven and diverse team from across the globe, united by a passion to make an impact. Harnessing our innovative technologies and strong partnerships, we aim to make travel easy and rewarding for everyone.
   

  

**Get to Know our Team:**
 In Agoda’s Engineering department, we build the scalable and fault-tolerant systems. Our systems cover all major areas of our business: website, mobile apps, affiliate apis, inventory and pricing, product information, customer data, communications, partner data, booking systems, payments, finance and more. These mission-critical systems change frequently with dozens of releases per day, so we must employ state-of-the-art CI/CD, experimentation and advanced testing techniques in order to make sure everything works without any downtime. We also ensure that our systems are self-healing, responding gracefully to extreme loads or unexpected input. In order to accomplish this, we use state-of-the-art languages like React, Redux state management, Javascript, Kotlin, Scala, data technologies like Kafka, Aerospike and Big Data, and agile development practices. Most importantly though, we hire great people from all around the world and empower them to be successful. Whether it’s building new projects like Flights and Packages or innovating on the latest fintech idea or reimagining our existing business, you’ll make a big impact as part of our Engineering team.
   

  

**The Opportunity:**
 The Senior Engineering Manager role at Agoda is one of the most significant and challenging roles in Technology. The right candidate has both deep technical knowledge and exhibits extremely strong leadership and people development skills. They should also have experience leading large engineering teams and managing managers.
   

  

**In this Role, you’ll get to:**
* Manage large engineering teams
* Directly manage engineering managers and star engineers.
* Provide technical input into new business ideas
* Work with senior leadership up to C-level
* Work and drive initiatives outside of your core team
* Build and guide the technical roadmap for your area
* Take ownership of major projects that are strategic to Agoda
* It’s important to have a love of engineering and a passion for building things elegantly and at scale. Staying in touch with where the industry is going is crucial, and it’s important to have strong opinions about how systems should be architected, engineered, and maintained
* Developing people – Despite our investment and belief in technology, people are still our greatest asset. The right candidate will have a keen interest in developing people: inspiring those around them so they can achieve their potential. Being able to bring A-players such as yourself from outside and integrating them into the business will also be important


**What you’ll Need to Succeed:**
* Experience managing large engineering teams (>25 people)
* Experience hiring and managing engineering managers
* Experience developing future engineering managers from within the company
* Experience rapidly growing a team
* Experience communicating to C-level
* At least 5 years of experience managing engineering teams , 10+ years of experience in software engineering.
* Demonstrable experience as a system owner with operational responsibility
* Able to operate with autonomously: making decisions, setting KPIs, with a strong sense of ownership
* Extremely proficient in at least one programming language ( React, Javascript Kotlin, Scala, Java, C#)
* Knowledge in scale, microservices and clean architecture
* A focus on velocity and quality, along with the right engineering metrics to guide and improve these
* Excellent people management and communication skills
* Minimum a B.S. in Computer Science or quantitative field;


**It’s Great if you have:**
* Proficiency in range of backend programming languages.
* Proficiency with web client-side technologies (React, Redux. state management, JavaScript, SASS, Performance optimization)
* Proficiency in one or more mobile platforms (iOS, Android, Web)
* Have experience managing in a data driven company with experience analyzing and working with Big Data
* A key player at an Internet company that is at scale with large numbers of users and transactions per second
* Worked on global projects serving world markets with distributed data centers


 #sanjose #losangeles #tirana #sydney #melbourne #perth #vienna #minsk #brussels #saopaolo #sofia #vancouver #shanghai #beijing #shenzhen #zagreb #cyprus #copenhagen #helsinki #paris #berlin #athens #hongkong #budapest #jakarta #dublin #telaviv #milan #rome #tokyo #osaka #luxembourg #kualalumpur #amsterdam #oslo #jerusalem #manila #moscow #belgrade #bratislava #barcelona #madrid #stockholm #zurich #taipei #tainan #istanbul #london #marrakech #wroclaw #rio #IT #4 #5
   

  

**Equal Opportunity Employer**
 At Agoda, we pride ourselves on being a company represented by people of all different backgrounds and orientations. We prioritize attracting diverse talent and cultivating an inclusive environment that encourages collaboration and innovation. Employment at Agoda is based solely on a person’s merit and qualifications. We are committed to providing equal employment opportunity regardless of sex, age, race, color, national origin, religion, marital status, pregnancy, sexual orientation, gender identity, disability, citizenship, veteran or military status, and other legally protected characteristics.
   

  

 We will keep your application on file so that we can consider you for future vacancies and you can always ask to have your details removed from the file. For more details please read our privacy policy .
   

  

 To all recruitment agencies: Agoda does not accept third party resumes. Please do not send resumes to our jobs alias, Agoda employees or any other organization location. Agoda is not responsible for any fees related to unsolicited resumes.

title: Senior Frontend Developer
description:
**You:** 
 an experienced frontend developer, looking for a new adventure. You want to find a role where you can be a driving force for modern, pragmatic and efficient development. A place where you will both architect and code. A place where it’s encouraged to take ownership and improve not only our products but also our ways of working. You bring heaps of experience and knowledge in JavaScript and modern frameworks – with an emphasis on Angular. You enjoy working in a team and engaging with stakeholders, but you also know how to focus and get things done.
 



  





**We:** 
 an old company in a young company’s body. We’ve been around for quite some time, but we still have a scale-up culture and mentality. We’re building cloud-based Accounts Payable products that help our customers automate and streamline their processes. We’re divided into separate, autonomous, product teams, but we really value collaborations and finding ways of sharing. We are on the path of modernizing our frontend stack and you have a great opportunity to join now and drive this forward.
 



  





**We really want you to have:** 



* A degree within IT/computer science or equivalent experience
* 7+ years of experience with JavaScript and Angular
* A deep understanding of frontend application architecture
* Experience in testing strategies and frameworks
* Experience working with agile development methods
* Demonstrated skills in collaboration and team engagement.
* A mindset of continuously learning and improving
* Ability to mentor and guide other developers.
* A passion for staying updated with the latest trends in technology.
* Good verbal and written communication; in English (must) and Swedish (preferably)



  





**We would also like if you have experience in:** 



* Other frontend frameworks
* A/B-testing and experimentation platforms
* End-user interaction and user testing
* API design and backend development (we use Java)
* UI/UX design



  





**What we offer** 



* Opportunity to work in a dynamic growth company
* Talented colleagues ready to support the success in your career path
* Social events with your colleagues (breakfast, candy-time, afterwork etc.)
* A collection of different benefits
* Hybrid working model
* Come and enjoy our beautiful office in central Stockholm (on the 14th floor, with amazing views)



  





**The recruitment process** 




 We review applications and invite for interviews continuously.
 



 A background check will be conducted on final candidates, pre-employment.
 



  





  





**About Rillion** 




*We are a global company founded in Sweden with 30 years’ experience in the AP Automation industry. We help finance professionals transform how they manage invoices by digitalizing and automating the entire process.* 




  





*By removing the manual steps of invoice handling, we enable finance teams to save time and effort, reducing the possibility of human error. Because we’re AP professionals ourselves, we understand how to give our customers everything they need, and nothing they don’t.* 




  





*Together with our investors at Altor we will continue our journey and to complete our mission, we need more talented people.* 




  





*Rillion is an equal opportunity employer. We believe that diversity is integral to our success, and do not discriminate based on race, color, religion, age, or any other basis protected by law.* 




  





*We're looking forward to your application!*

title: Senior Full Stack Engineer
description:
Cloud innovations change the gaming industry landscape every day, adding new capabilities, allowing new scenarios, and redefining the category. Our mission is to provide a reliable, and easy way to develop and operate game servers. Within EA, the Game Server Hosting group builds the important game server infrastructure that underpins EA's current generation of multiplayer games and fuels development of the next wave. We are looking for a Software Engineer to join the team driving our game server platform forward and help ship EA's next amazing multiplayer game.
   

  

**What a Senior Software Engineer does on EA's Game Server Hosting team:**
 Reporting To The Director Of Engineering, Game Server Hosting, Your Primary Responsibility Will Be To Influence The Architecture And Design Of Our Containerized Software And Services Infrastructure, Then Guide The Delivery Of Those Designs. Most Of Your Time Will Be Spent Working With Your Teammates, Planning And Creating High-quality Services And Systems That Power And Support EA Games And Their Dedicated Game Servers. You Will Contribute To The Growth Of The Entire Team Through Active Participation Processes Such As Mentoring And Code Reviews, Promoting Best Practices Both Internally To The Team And Externally With Partners. Here Are Some Other Activities We Expect Of You
   

  

* Develop creative solutions that address customer requests, deliver new features and fix defects
* Collaborate with customers and product owners across teams and time zones to create designs that balance priorities and requirements and can be broken down into clear execution plans
* Develop well-tested code that follows peer-reviewed coding standards
* Guide the debugging of complex and hard to reproduce problems and contribute to post-mortems for unsuccessful releases
* Communicate, and enforce our quality processes, coding best practices
* Enhance EA's engineering capabilities through tracking of industry, segment, and technology transformations
* Support and mentor other team members through advice, coaching and educational opportunities and impart, design, and debugging skills to them


**The Next Great EA Software Engineer Needs To Have**
* 10+ years fullstack commercial development experience
* Expertise with one or more web development frameworks - React, Angular, VueJS
* Expertise developing RESTful web services or gRPC services at Internet consumer scale
* 3+ years hands-on domain experience in cloud operational infrastructure and services
* Experience working on high traffic services and scalable systems, multi-threaded design with a complete understanding of an OO language
* Experience working within one or more public cloud providers (AWS, Azure, GCP)
* Firsthand use of scaling technologies such as memcached, queuing
* First hand experience in all phases of a modern service development lifecycle, including requirement definition, architecture, technical development, debugging, testing, troubleshooting, product release, and live operation.


**Bonus Experience Points**
* Proficiency with Golang
* Experience with Kubernetes as an orchestration system for large numbers of workloads (1000+ pods in multiple regions)
* Familiarity with game engines and game software development processes
* Engineering Collaboration software - JIRA, GitLab, GitHub, or Confluence

title: Erfaren Teknisk Skribent
description:
Etteplan är en ledande aktör inom teknikkonsultbranschen som ständigt strävar efter att forma framtidens innovationer. Vi söker passionerade och skickliga individer som vill vara en del av vårt dynamiska team och bidra till att lösa komplexa tekniska utmaningar. Hos oss får du möjlighet att arbeta med spännande projekt och kunder, samarbeta med experter inom olika teknikområden och utveckla innovativa lösningar som kommer att påverka samhället. Bli en del av vårt framgångsrika team där dina idéer blir verklighet och ditt arbete gör en verklig skillnad!
   

  

**Din roll**
 I rollen som teknisk skribent kommer du att arbeta nära våra kunder. Dessa finns inom flera olika branscher och många är också branschledande inom sina respektive områden. Vi arbetar i både nationella och internationella projekt där vi leder och fördelar arbetet, men även på uppdrag hos våra kunder. Placeringsorten kommer att vara Stockholm och teamet består av teknikinformatörer med olika kompetenser - skribenter, illustratörer, metodtekniker, projektledare och kombinationer av dessa. Vi arbetar ofta över kontorsgränserna och tillämpar hybridarbete, vilket kan ge möjlighet att arbeta viss tid från annan plats än kontoret.
   

  

 Som teknisk skribent är din huvudsakliga arbetsuppgift att skapa och utveckla olika typer av teknisk dokumentation åt någon eller några av våra kunder. Du kommer att erbjudas möjlighet att arbeta både under eget ansvar i mindre projekt men även som en del av större projekt. Du kommer att ha kontakt med kund för informationsöverföring och ansvarar sedan för processen från start till klart – självständigt eller i en arbetsgrupp.
   

  

 Vårt recept på framgång är teamwork, utveckling och en stor dos ”kul på jobbet”. Tillsammans jobbar vi också för att ge våra kunder de allra bästa lösningarna.
   

  

**Din profil**
 Vi lägger stor vikt vid dina personliga egenskaper och söker dig som vill fortsätta utvecklas som teknisk skribent. Du tar dig an utmaningar med en nyfikenhet, har en positiv inställning och är lösningsorienterad. Du gillar samarbete men är samtidigt självgående och tar ansvar för dina arbetsuppgifter. Vidare är du kommunikativ och uttrycker dig obehindrat på både svenska och engelska för en effektiv dialog med kunder och medarbetare.
   

  

 För att kunna möta våra kunders behov behöver du dessutom:
   

  

* Vara en van teknisk skribent med en genuin känsla för text och struktur
* Ha en passande eftergymnasial utbildning, som ger dig en bra grund som teknisk skribent
* Kunna förstå nya produkter och sätta dig in i användarens informationsbehov vid det givna tillfället
* Vara bekväm med att jobba i något XML-baserat CMS samt kunna skriva topic-baserat


 Vi förutsätter att du är van vid att arbeta med verktygen inom Adobe Creative Cloud och Microsoft 365. Det är meriterande om du har kunskap inom CAD, STE (Simplified Technical English), DITA och/eller S1000D.
   

  

**Vi erbjuder**
 Hos oss får du ett jobb som är meningsfullt. På Etteplan har vi turen att få arbeta med intressanta och viktiga projekt som bidrar till samhällsnyttan och att skapa ett tryggt och säkert samhälle. Många människor får nytta och glädje av de utvecklingsprojekt som vi är delaktiga i - och det är någonting som vi vet att våra medarbetare är stolta över.
   

  

 Vi erbjuder dig en intressant och internationell arbetsmiljö, samt stöd från både kollegor och företaget i helhet. Vi stödjer work-life balance, inte bara genom riktigt bra förmåner, utan även genom möjligheten till hybridarbete. Hos oss har alla medarbetare en chans att påverka sin arbetsmiljö och kultur genom tipsrekryteringar, där tips som leder till anställning ger medarbetaren en bonus på 15 000 SEK, vilket är väldigt uppskattat.
   

  

 Låter detta intressant? Om du har några funderingar får du gärna kontakta rekryterande chef Andreas Edquist.
   

  

 Läs mer om hur det är att jobba på Etteplan och träffa dina framtida kollegor här.
   

  

*Etteplan – For the better*

title: HCM Solutions Consultant
description:
Are you the type of consultant who not only loves structure but also has a natural charisma, the ability to bring a project team together and get everyone working towards a common goal? Do you understand the importance of digitizing HR-related processes in a modern organization and are motivated by efficiency and technical solutions? Do you also have experience in implementing business-critical systems? If so, we’re looking for a system-interested HCM Solution Consultant to join the team in our Stockholm office.
 



  





 We offer you an opportunity to really make a difference for both future and existing customers by leading or being a part of complex implementation projects of our HCM (Human Capital Management) platform. We always aim to onboard our customers in a way that brings them the most value of our platform as quickly as possible and empowers them to continue the adaption of their solution as their journey unfolds – in close partnership with us. The system implementation project plays an essential part in that promise.
 



  





  





**What you’ll do as HCM Solutions Consultant:** 



* Work to optimise the outcome for the specific customer:
* Be a partner to the customer; be curious and gain insights about the customer to support, coach and challenge them to the best solution considering their specific needs, visions
* Secure minimized time to value for the customer
* Always consider the big picture: see the connection between the setup of data and configuration of processes in the system in relation to the effect integrations have on the existing system landscape
* Secure that the project is on time, within the scope and within budget and properly document project progress, solution, and decisions in CatalystOne Projects
* In the role of Project Manager, manage multiple implementation projects by simultaneously taking the main responsibility for the overall project with regards to schedule, scope, structure, resources, communication, risks, and stakeholders
* In the role of HR Consultant, act as solution and system expert during configuration and data migration, run customer meetings and training sessions
* Secure we stay relevant to our customers by contributing to the continuous improvement of implementation methodology and material - in collaboration with and under the leadership of the Centre of Excellence
* Secure product requests from customers are propagated to Product Management via the established channels
* Actively share knowledge of trends, common practices, and other relevant insights



  





  





**Requirements:** 



* Experience with implementing business-critical applications (HCM, ERP, Payroll, T&A etc.).
* Several years of experience working as a consultant
* Can "talk" IT with HR and vice versa
* Strong organization and time management skills
* Excellent communication and leadership skills
* Contributes to an inspirational and motivating working environment
* Fluent in a Scandinavian language, as well as English



  





  





**Benefits** 




 As well as your salary, you’ll receive:
 


* 30 days’ vacation per year
* Pension and insurance package, including private healthcare
* Wellness contribution
* Laptop, Mobile phone & subscription, and home internet allowance
* Flexibility to work in a hybrid setup
* And more…



  





  





 CatalystOne is a Scandinavian leader of HCM-software with nearly 250 employees throughout Norway, Sweden, Denmark, and India (R&D). We have, since 2004, built a strong value-based company driven by our customers' success. Our culture is characterized by a unique combination of emphasis on results and on people. We have experienced high growth in recent years and have the ambition to continue this growth both in Scandinavia and in other North-European countries.
 



  





 CatalystOne is an equal opportunity employer that is committed to diversity and inclusion in the workplace. We prohibit discrimination and harassment of any kind based on race, color, sex, religion, sexual orientation, national origin, disability, genetic information, pregnancy, or any other protected characteristic.
 



  





*CatalystOne does not accept unsolicited resumes from search firms/recruiters. CatalystOne will not pay any fees to search firms/recruiters if a candidate is submitted by a search firm/recruiter unless an agreement has been entered into with respect to the specific open position(s). Search firms/recruiters submitting resumes to CatalystOne on an unsolicited basis shall be deemed to accept this condition, regardless of any other provision to the contrary.*

title: Observability - Hosted Services - Senior Software Engineer (Go, AWS, GCP)
description:
Elastic is a free and open search company that powers enterprise search, observability, and security solutions built on one technology stack that can be deployed anywhere. From finding documents to monitoring infrastructure to hunting for threats, Elastic makes data usable in real-time and at scale. Thousands of organizations worldwide, including Barclays, Cisco, eBay, Fairfax, ING, Goldman Sachs, Microsoft, The Mayo Clinic, NASA, The New York Times, Wikipedia, and Verizon, use Elastic to power mission-critical systems. Founded in 2012,
 **Elastic is a distributed company** 
 with Elasticians around the globe. Learn more at
 **elastic.co** 
 .
   

  

 The Observability team is in charge of developing solutions that focus on application developers and engineers that run infrastructure and services supporting these applications. Elasticsearch is an efficient datastore for logs, metrics, and application traces, supporting the three pillars of observability. The Observability team builds and maintains solutions that make getting insights from this data turnkey and efficient, such as our
 **APM** 
 ,
 **Infrastructure Monitoring** 
 ,
 **Logs** 
 , and
 **Uptime** 
 solutions. We are creating an end-to-end experience for our users: data collection, efficient storage in Elasticsearch, data visualization, and finally what actions do we take on the insights from the data ?
   

  

 As a Software Engineer, you will be part of the Hosted Services team and work with your peers, Product Management, and Technical Leadership to make our Observability product the best in class ! This team empowers our users to monitor their applications running in the Cloud and in Cloud Native environments through various inputs, integrations and managed services. The team is diverse and distributed across the world, and collaborates every day over GitHub, Zoom, and Slack.
   

  

**What You Will Be Doing**
* You will contribute to the team's roadmap execution through backlog issues and bigger projects, and you will work with product management to define new features and capabilities
* Write and review code to deliver features efficiently
* With your team, you will take care of our products and process to make sure we apply the best standards of quality, performance and efficiency
* Collaborate with the other teams inside and outside Observability in defining and implementing the end-to-end experience for our Observability products
* Interact with the community and help them use and love our products
* You will be involved in resolving Elastic customer support issues, ensuring SLAs are met
* You will participate in 24x365 on-call scheduled rotations with your team


**What You Bring Along**
* You have acquired experience working with AWS, GCP, Azure or Cloud Native environments
* You are comfortable writing software in Go. We are using it regularly but are also encouraged to contribute to the product codebase in Python, Java or Typescript
* You know how to build and maintain managed services (dev, tests, performance, CI/CD, monitoring, doc...)
* You have excellent verbal and written communication skills, and you are an amazing teammate with strong analytical, problem solving, debugging and troubleshooting skills, with ability to work in a distributed team
* You've been in a SRE role or have SRE knowledge, which gives you an extra care of what data we should collect, how we should display it, and how our users could have the best of it
* You stay aware of the trends of the Open Source world and the Observability market


**Additional Information - We Take Care Of Our People**
 As a distributed company, diversity drives our identity. Whether you’re looking to launch a new career or grow an existing one, Elastic is the type of company where you can balance great work with great life. Your age is only a number. It doesn’t matter if you’re just out of college or your children are; we need you for what you can do.
   

  

 We strive to have parity of benefits across regions and while regulations differ from place to place, we believe taking care of our people is the right thing to do.
   

  

* Competitive pay based on the work you do here and not your previous salary
* Health coverage for you and your family in many locations
* Ability to craft your calendar with flexible locations and schedules for many roles
* Generous number of vacation days each year
* Increase your impact - We match up to $2000 (or local currency equivalent) for financial donations and service
* Up to 40 hours each year to use toward volunteer projects you love
* Embracing parenthood with minimum of 16 weeks of parental leave


 Different people approach problems differently. We need that. Elastic is an equal opportunity/affirmative action employer committed to diversity, equity, and inclusion. Qualified applicants will receive consideration for employment without regard to race, ethnicity, color, religion, sex, pregnancy, sexual orientation, gender perception or identity, national origin, age, marital status, protected veteran status, disability status, or any other basis protected by federal, state or local law, ordinance or regulation.
   

  

 We welcome individuals with disabilities and strive to create an accessible and inclusive experience for all individuals. To request an accommodation during the application or the recruiting process, please email candidate\_accessibility@elastic.co We will reply to your request within 24 business hours of submission.
   

  

 Applicants have rights under Federal Employment Laws, view posters linked below: Family and Medical Leave Act (FMLA) Poster; Pay Transparency Nondiscrimination Provision Poster; Employee Polygraph Protection Act (EPPA) Poster and Know Your Rights (Poster)
   

  

 Please see here for our Privacy Statement.

title: Solution Design Engineer
description:
*CEVA Logistics provides global supply chain solutions to connect people, products and providers all around the world. We are supply chain experts. We live and breathe logistics every day. Above all, we believe that this is a people business. That’s why we are building a global culture of teamwork and respect. We encourage initiative, and we engage and empower our diverse workforce to grow their careers within CEVA.**CEVA Logistics offers a broad range of end-to-end, customized solutions in both Contract Logistics and Freight Management thanks to our approximately 98,000 employees at more than 1,000 facilities in 160 countries worldwide. With the recent acquisition of the former Ingram Micro Commerce & Lifecycle Services business, we are building one of the world’s leading end-to-end eCommerce service offerings through the dedication and passion of our people—the heartbeat of our organization. As we continue growing at a fast pace, will you “Dare to Grow” with us?*  

YOUR ROLE  

Our operation in Boras, Sweden has an exciting opportunity for a dynamic and analytically focused Solution Design Engineer to join the team where you will take ownership of solution design projects.  

WHAT ARE YOU GOING TO DO?  

Reporting into a Site Manager, you will provide detailed analytical support and engage in best practice solution design for new business propositions and contract renewals. Your main focuses of responsibility will be:* Undertake solution design projects autonomously, ensuring high-quality, innovative, cost-effective warehouse and/or distribution solutions are designed and presented within specified standards and timelines.
* Initiate and lead the gathering and analysis of information from current and prospective customers, collaborating with other functions within CEVA to ensure proposals and presentations meet client expectations.
* Assist senior management in producing internal and external proposals and presentations, contributing relevant sections and participating in presentations as required.
* Conduct solution operational reviews alongside the Site Manager to secure operational and financial approvals.
* Ensure all design and analysis tasks are completed within agreed-upon timescales, maintaining efficiency and meeting project milestones.
* Assist in contract implementations and other off-site projects as needed, contributing to the overall success of the team and organization.

  

WHAT ARE WE LOOKING FOR?  

To be successful in your application you will already be operating in a solutions design role experienced in a wide range of projects with a thorough understanding of warehouse operations. You will have previously prepared warehouse layouts, analysed operational costs and be competent in using various modelling software, such as AutoCAD or equivalent.  

You will possess exceptional communication, analytical and problem-solving skills, able to interpret and present complex information to a wide range of internal and external stakeholders. You will be able to build strong working relationships with stakeholder groups and practiced in partnering with project management and business development teams.  

It would be desirable if you have experience of working in third party logistics environments and practiced in new business implementations.  

WHAT DO WE HAVE TO OFFER?  

With a genuine culture of reward and recognition, we want our employees to grow, develop and be part of our journey. We offer a benefits package that includes competitive annual leave entitlement with a fantastic holiday buy scheme, pension and life. There’s no doubt that you will be compensated for your hard work and commitment so if you’d like to work for one of the top Logistics providers in the world then please do get in touch to find your next role.  

ABOUT TOMORROW  

We value your professional and personal growth. That’s why we share plenty of career opportunities for you to thrive within CEVA. Join CEVA for a challenging career.  

CEVA Logistics UK&I is committed to attracting, acquiring and retaining the best possible candidates in an equal and inclusive way that is consistent with employment legislation and best practice. We aim to select the best available person for every vacancy irrespective of age, disability, colour, race, nationality, ethnic or national origin, religion or belief, political beliefs, sex, sexual orientation, gender reassignment and marital or civil partnership status.  

Please note that candidates will be subject to the necessary right to work checks for the UK and Ireland.
company_description: CEVA is a leading global logistics operator, providing dedicated solutions in contract logistics, air and sea freight, distribution and transport management to its customers on all continents.

title: Global Sales Manager CES
description:
Trelleborg is a world leader in engineered polymer solutions for almost every industry on the planet. And we are where we are because our talents brought us here. By specializing in the polymer engineering that makes innovation and application possible, Trelleborg works closely with leading industry brands to accelerate their performance, drive their business forward—and along the way, shape the industry and progress that will benefit humankind in the exciting years ahead. Our people are Shaping Industry from the Inside. Why don´t you join us?

Do you want to experience new challenges and innovate the future of engineered polymer solutions? Accelerate your career with Trelleborg and start shaping industry from the inside.


**Who are we?**



Trelleborg Industrial Solutions (TIS) is a global leader in innovative polymer-based solutions for key industries and critical infrastructure. We are one of two Business Areas within the Trelleborg Group, with a total of about 6 200 employees around the world.


*This will be the first paragraph of your job ad. Describe your BU assuming they know nothing about you. Explain why this is a great organization to work for.*


**About the Job**



The Global Sales Manager is responsible for driving revenue growth and market penetration within the targeted industries (Manufacturing & Machine Tools, Renewable Energy & Telecom) and reports directly to the BU Sales Director EMEA.



You will develop and implement a business development strategy that aligns with the organization´s overall Vision 2030 in BU Antivibration Solutions,



The Global Sales Manager works with the CES Sales team in order to develop and implement sales and marketing strategy.



You will lead and coach a team of sales professionals and work closely with cross-functional teams to develop and execute strategies in order to manage their portfolio of existing accounts, winning new customers and for maximum revenue generation.



All Manager & Supervisors are responsible for demonstrating leadership and commitment with respect to the management system by:


* Develop and implement strategic sales plans to achieve revenue targets and expand market share within the marine segment
* Lead, mentor, and motivate a global sales team to drive performance and exceed sales goals
* Think strategically - seeing the bigger picture and setting aims and objectives in order to develop and improve the business
